# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-104">敏感信息类型属性定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-105">合规性中心 (DLP) 数据丢失防护包括许多可供 DLP 策略使用的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-106">本文列出了所有这些敏感信息类型，并演示 DLP 策略在检测到每种类型时查找的信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-106">This article lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-107">若要了解有关敏感信息类型的信息，请参阅 [敏感信息类型](sensitive-information-type-learn-about.md)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-107">To learn more about sensitive information types, see [Sensitive information types](sensitive-information-type-learn-about.md)</span></span>

## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-108">ABA 路由号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-108">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-109">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-109">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-110">9 个数字，可能采用格式化或无格式模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-110">nine digits that may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-111">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-111">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-112">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-112">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-113">四个数字，以 0、1、2、3、6、7 或 8 开头</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-113">four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-114">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-114">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-115">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-115">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-116">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-116">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-117">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-117">a digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-118">无格式：九个以 0、1、2、3、6、7 或 8 开头的连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-118">Unformatted: nine consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-119">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-119">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-120">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-120">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-121">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-121">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-122">如果策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则策略具有中等可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-122">A policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-123">函数 Func_aba_routing 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-123">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-124">找到 Keyword_ABA_Routing 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-124">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-125">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-125">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-126">函数 Func_aba_routing 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-126">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- ABA Routing Number -->
    <Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-144">阿根廷国家/ (DNI) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-144">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-145">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-145">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-146">带或不带句号的八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-146">Eight digits with or without periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-147">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-147">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-148">八个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-148">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-149">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-149">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-150">可选时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-150">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-151">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-151">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-152">可选时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-152">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-153">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-153">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-154">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-154">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-155">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-155">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-156">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-156">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-157">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-157">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-158">正则表达式 Regex_argentina_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-158">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-159">找到 Keyword_argentina_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-159">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_argentina_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-161">Keyword_argentina_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-161">Keyword_argentina_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-162">Argentina National Identity number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-162">Argentina National Identity number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-163">cedula</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-163">cedula</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-164">cédula</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-164">cédula</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-165">dni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-165">dni</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-166">documento nacional de identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-166">documento nacional de identidad</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-167">documento número</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-167">documento número</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-168">documento numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-168">documento numero</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-169">registro nacional de las personas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-169">registro nacional de las personas</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-170">rnp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-170">rnp</span></span> 
   
## <a name="argentina-unique-tax-identification-key-cuitcuil"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-171">阿根廷唯一税务识别密钥 (CUIT/CUIL) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-171">Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-172">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-172">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-173">带破折号的十一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-173">Eleven digits with dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-174">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-174">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-175">带破折号的十一个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-175">Eleven digits with a dash:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-176">20、23、24、27、30、33 或 34 中的两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-176">two digits in 20, 23, 24, 27, 30, 33 or 34</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-177">连字符 (-) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-177">a hyphen (-)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-178">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-178">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-179">连字符 (-) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-179">a hyphen (-)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-180">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-180">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-181">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-181">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-182">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-182">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-183">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-183">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-184">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-184">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-185">函数 `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-185">The function `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-186">找到 的 `Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-186">A keyword from `Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-187">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-187">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-188">函数 `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-188">The function `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL) -->
      <Entity id="98da3da1-9199-4571-b7c4-b6522980b507" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-194">Clave Única de Identificación Tribut一</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-194">Clave Única de Identificación Tributaria</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-195">唯一的树标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-195">unique labour identification code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-196">CUIL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-196">CUIL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-197">唯一税务标识密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-197">Unique Tax Identification Key</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-198">唯一的位元标识密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-198">Unique Labour Identification Key</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-202">唯一工作标识密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-202">Unique Work Identification Key</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-203">工作标识的唯一密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-203">Unique Key of Work Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-204">唯一的税务识别代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-204">Unique Code of Tax Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-205">税务识别的唯一密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-205">Unique Key of Tax Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-206">唯一人工标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-206">Unique Labor Identification Code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-207">唯一的人工标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-207">Unique Code of Labor Identification</span></span>

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-227">澳大利亚银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-227">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-228">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-228">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-229">具有或不带银行省/市/县分支机构号码的六到十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-229">six to ten digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-230">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-230">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-231">帐户号码是 6 到 10 个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-231">Account number is 6 to 10 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-232">澳大利亚银行州级分部编号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-232">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-233">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-233">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-234">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-234">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-235">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-235">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-236">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-236">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-237">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-237">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-238">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-238">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-239">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-239">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-240">正则表达式Regex_australia_bank_account_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-240">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-241">找到 Keyword_australia_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-241">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-242">正则表达式 Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-242">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-243">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-243">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-244">正则表达式Regex_australia_bank_account_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-244">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-245">找到 Keyword_australia_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-245">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-250">base currency</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-250">base currency</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-251">usa account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-251">usa account</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-252">holder address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-252">holder address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-253">bank address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-253">bank address</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-259">full names</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-259">full names</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-260">系统</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-260">iaea</span></span>

## <a name="australia-business-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-261">澳大利亚商务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-261">Australia business number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-262">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-262">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-263">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-263">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-264">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-264">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-265">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-265">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-266">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-266">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-267">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-267">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-268">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-268">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-269">带可选分隔符的 11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-269">11 digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-270">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-270">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-271">带可选分隔符的 11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-271">11 digits with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-272">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-272">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-273">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-273">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-274">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-274">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-275">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-275">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-276">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-276">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-277">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-277">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-278">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-278">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-279">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-279">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-280">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-280">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-281">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-281">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-282">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-282">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-283">函数Func_australian_business_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-283">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-284">找到来自Keywords_australian_business_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-284">A keyword from Keywords_australian_business_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-285">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-285">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-286">函数Func_australian_business_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-286">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Business Number -->
      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-287">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-287">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_business_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-288">Keyword_australia_business_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-288">Keyword_australia_business_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-289">australia business no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-289">australia business no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-293">业务 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-293">business id</span></span>

## <a name="australia-company-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-296">澳大利亚公司编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-296">Australia company number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-297">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-297">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-298">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-298">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-299">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-299">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-300">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-300">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-301">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-301">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-302">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-302">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-303">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-303">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-304">九个数字（带分隔符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-304">nine digits with delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-305">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-305">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-306">带分隔符的九个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-306">nine digits with delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-307">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-307">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-308">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-308">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-309">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-309">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-310">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-310">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-311">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-311">three digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-312">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-312">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-313">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-313">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-314">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-314">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-315">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-315">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-316">函数Func_Australian_Company_Number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-316">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-317">找到来自Keyword_Australian_Company_Number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-317">A keyword from Keyword_Australian_Company_Number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-318">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-318">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-319">函数Func_Australian_Company_Number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-319">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Company Number -->
      <Entity id="b1fba4f7-7b3e-4bb9-8f9a-9366df604dbb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
```

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-329">澳大利亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-329">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-330">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-330">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-331">九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-331">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-332">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-332">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-333">九个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-333">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-334">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-334">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-335">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-335">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-336">五个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-336">five digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-337">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-337">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-338">一到两个可选字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-338">one to two optional letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-339">四到九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-339">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-340">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-340">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-341">九个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-341">nine digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-342">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-342">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-343">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-343">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-344">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-344">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-345">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-345">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-346">正则表达式 Regex_australia_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-346">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-347">找到 Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-347">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-348">未找到 Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-348">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-448">澳大利亚医疗帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-448">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-449">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-449">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-450">10-11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-450">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-451">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-451">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-452">10-11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-452">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-453">第一个数字范围为 2-6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-453">First digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-454">九个数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-454">Nine digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-455">第十个数字是问题数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-455">Tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-456">第十一个数字（可选）是个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-456">Eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-457">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-457">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-458">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-458">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-459">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-459">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-460">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-460">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-461">函数 Func_australian_medical_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-461">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-462">找到 Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-462">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-463">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-463">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-464">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-464">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_medical_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-465">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-465">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-466">bank account details</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-466">bank account details</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-467">medicare payments</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-467">medicare payments</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-468">mortgage account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-468">mortgage account</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-469">bank payments</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-469">bank payments</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-470">information branch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-470">information branch</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-471">credit card loan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-471">credit card loan</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-472">department of human services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-472">department of human services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-473">local service</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-473">local service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-474">一</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-474">medicare</span></span>

   
## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-475">澳大利亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-475">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-476">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-476">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-477">一个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-477">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-478">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-478">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-479">字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-479">A letter (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-480">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-480">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-481">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-481">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-482">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-482">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-483">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-483">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-484">正则表达式 Regex_australia_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-484">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-485">找到来自Keyword_passport或Keyword_australia_passport_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-485">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-519">澳大利亚税务文件编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-519">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-520">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-520">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-521">八到九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-521">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-522">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-522">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-523">通常用空格显示八到九个数字，如下所示：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-523">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-524">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-524">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-525">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-525">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-526">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-526">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-527">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-527">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-528">两到三个数字，其中最后一个数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-528">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-529">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-529">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-530">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-530">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-531">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-531">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-532">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-532">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-533">函数 Func_australian_tax_file_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-533">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-534">未找到 Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number 或 Keyword_number_exclusions 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-534">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-535">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-535">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-536">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-536">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-537">Keyword_australia_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-537">Keyword_australia_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-538">australian business number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-538">australian business number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-539">marginal tax rate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-539">marginal tax rate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-540">medicare levy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-540">medicare levy</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-541">portfolio number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-541">portfolio number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-542">service veterans</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-542">service veterans</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-543">withholding tax</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-543">withholding tax</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-544">individual tax return</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-544">individual tax return</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-545">tax file number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-545">tax file number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-546">tfn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-546">tfn</span></span>

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-547">奥地利驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-547">Austria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-548">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-548">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-549">八个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-549">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-550">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-550">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-551">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-551">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-552">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-552">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-553">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-553">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-554">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-554">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-555">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-555">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-556">正则表达式查找  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-556">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-557">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-557">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="682f18ce-44eb-482b-8198-2bcb96a0761e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-684">奥地利身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-684">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-685">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-685">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-686">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-686">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-687">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-687">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-688">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-688">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-689">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-689">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-690">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-690">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-691">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-691">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-692">字母、数字和特殊字符的 24 个字符组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-692">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-693">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-693">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-694">24 个字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-694">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-695">22 个字母 (不区分大小写) 数字、反斜杠、正斜杠或加号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-695">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-696">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 、数字、反斜杠、正斜杠、加号或等号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-696">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-697">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-697">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-698">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-698">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-699">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-699">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-700">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-700">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-701">正则表达式查找  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-701">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-702">找到 的  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-702">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-703">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-703">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-704">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-704">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-705">标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-705">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-706">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-706">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-707">personalaus一sich österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-707">personalausweis republik österreich</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-708">奥地利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-708">Austria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-709">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-709">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-710">一个字母后跟一个可选空格和七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-710">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-711">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-711">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-712">一个字母、七个数字和一个空格的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-712">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-713">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-713">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-714">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-714">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-715">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-715">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-716">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-716">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-717">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-717">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-718">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-718">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-719">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-719">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-720">正则表达式查找  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-720">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-721">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-721">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-722">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-722">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-723">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-723">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-724">正则表达式查找  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-724">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-725">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-725">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1c96ae4e-303b-447d-86c7-77113ac266bf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-739">reisepassnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-739">reisepassnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-740">reisepasse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-740">reisepasse</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-743">Reisepass-Nr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-743">Reisepass-Nr</span></span>

## <a name="austria-social-security-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-749">奥地利社会保险号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-749">Austria social security number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-750">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-750">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-751">10 个数字，采用指定格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-751">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-752">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-752">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-753">10 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-753">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-754">对应于序列号的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-754">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-755">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-755">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-756">六个数字，对应于 DDMMYY (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-756">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-757">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-757">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-758">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-758">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-759">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-759">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-760">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-760">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-761">函数  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-761">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-762">找到 的  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-762">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-763">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-763">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-764">函数  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-764">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Social Security Number -->
      <Entity id="6896a906-86c9-4d19-a2da-6e43ccd19b7b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-765">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-765">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-773">insurance no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-773">insurance no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-774">kr一nkassennummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-774">krankenkassennummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-775">一名或多名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-775">krankenversicherung</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-776">socialsecurityno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-776">socialsecurityno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-777">socialsecurityno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-777">socialsecurityno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-778">social security no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-778">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-779">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-779">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-780">social security code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-780">social security code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-781">sozialversicherungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-781">sozialversicherungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-782">sozialversicherungsnummer#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-782">sozialversicherungsnummer#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-783">soziale sicherheit kein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-783">soziale sicherheit kein</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-784">sozialesicherheitkein#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-784">sozialesicherheitkein#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-785">ssn#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-785">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-786">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-786">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-787">versicherungscode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-787">versicherungscode</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-788">versicherungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-788">versicherungsnummer</span></span>

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-790">奥地利税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-790">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-791">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-791">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-792">九个数字，带可选连字符和正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-792">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-793">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-793">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-794">九个数字，带可选连字符和正斜杠：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-794">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-795">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-795">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-796">连字符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-796">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-797">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-797">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-798">可选参数， (正斜) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-798">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-799">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-799">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-800">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-800">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-801">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-801">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-802">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-802">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-803">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-803">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-804">函数  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-804">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-805">找到 的  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-805">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-806">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-806">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-807">函数  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-807">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-830">奥地利增值税</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-830">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-831">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-831">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-832">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-832">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-833">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-833">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-834">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-834">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-835">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-835">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-836">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-836">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-837">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-837">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-838">11 字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-838">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-839">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-839">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-840">11 字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-840">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-841">A 或 a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-841">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-842">T 或 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-842">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-843">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-843">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-844">U 或 u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-844">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-845">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-845">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-846">两个或三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-846">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-847">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-847">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-848">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-848">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-849">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-849">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-850">一个或两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-850">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-851">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-851">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-852">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-852">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-853">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-853">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-854">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-854">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-855">函数Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-855">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-856">找到来自Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-856">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-857">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-857">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-858">函数Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-858">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-859">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-859">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_austria_value_added_tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-860">Keyword_austria_value_added_tax</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-860">Keyword_austria_value_added_tax</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-861">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-861">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-862">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-862">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-863">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-863">austrian vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-864">vat no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-864">vat no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-865">vatno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-865">vatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-866">增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-866">value added tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-867">vat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-867">austrian vat</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-868">mwst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-868">mwst</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-869">umsatzsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-869">umsatzsteuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-870">mwstnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-870">mwstnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-871">ust.-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-871">ust.-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-872">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-872">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-873">vat 标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-873">vat identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-874">atu number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-874">atu number</span></span>
