## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-876">Azure DocumentDB 身份验证密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-876">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-877">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-877">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-878">字符串"DocumentDb"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-878">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-879">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-879">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-880">字符串"DocumentDb"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-880">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-881">3-200 位小写或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-881">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-882">大于符号 (>) 、等号 (=) 、引号 (") 或撇号 (') </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-882">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-883">86 个小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-883">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-884">两个等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-884">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-885">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-885">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-886">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-886">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-887">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-887">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-888">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-888">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-889">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-889">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-890">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-890">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-891">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-891">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-892">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-892">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-893"> (，从技术上说，此敏感信息类型使用正则表达式（而不是关键字列表）标识这些) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-893">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-894">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-894">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-895">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-895">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-896">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-896">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-897">沙盒</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-897">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-898">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-898">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-899">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-899">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-900">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-900">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-901">testacs。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-901">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-902">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-902">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-903">s-int。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-903">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-904">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-904">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-905">Azure IAAS 数据库连接字符串和 Azure SQL连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-905">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-906">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-906">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-907">字符串"Server"、"server"或"data source"，后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串，包括字符串"cloudapp.azure"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-907">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-908">com"或"cloudapp.azure"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-908">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-909">net"或"database.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-909">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-910">net"，字符串"Password"或"password"或"pwd"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-910">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-911">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-911">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-912">字符串"Server"、"server"或"data source"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-912">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-913">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-913">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-914">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-914">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-915">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-915">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-916">1-200 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-916">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-917">字符串"cloudapp.azure"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-917">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-918">com"、"cloudapp.azure"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-918">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-919">net"或"database.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-919">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-920">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-920">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-921">1-300 位小写或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-921">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-922">字符串"Password"、"password"或"pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-922">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-923">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-923">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-924">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-924">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-925">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-925">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-926">一个或多个不是分号字符 (;) 、引号 (") 或撇 (字符) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-926">one or more characters that aren't a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-927">分号 (;) 、引号 (") 或撇号 (") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-927">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-928">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-928">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-929">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-929">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-930">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-930">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-931">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-931">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-932">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-932">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-933">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-933">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-934">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-934">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-935">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-935">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-936"> (，从技术上说，此敏感信息类型使用正则表达式（而不是关键字列表）标识这些) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-936">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-937">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-937">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-938">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-938">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-939">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-939">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-940">沙盒</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-940">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-941">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-941">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-942">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-942">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-943">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-943">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-944">testacs。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-944">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-945">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-945">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-946">s-int。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-946">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-947">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-947">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iot-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-948">Azure IoT连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-948">Azure IoT connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-949">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-949">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-950">字符串"HostName"后跟模式中列出的字符和字符串，包括字符串"azure-devices"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-950">The string "HostName" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-951">net"和"SharedAccessKey"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-951">net" and "SharedAccessKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-952">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-952">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-953">字符串"HostName"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-953">the string "HostName"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-954">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-954">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-955">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-955">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-956">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-956">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-957">1-200 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-957">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-958">字符串"azure-devices"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-958">the string "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-959">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-959">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-960">1-200 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-960">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-961">字符串"SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-961">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-962">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-962">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-963">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-963">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-964">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-964">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-965">43 个小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-965">any combination of 43 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-966">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-966">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-967">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-967">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-968">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-968">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-969">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-969">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-970">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-970">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-971">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-971">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-972">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-972">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IoT Connection String-->
<Entity id="0b34bec3-d5d6-4974-b7b0-dcdb5c90c29d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-982">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-982">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-983">testacs。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-983">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-984">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-984">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-985">s-int。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-985">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-986">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-986">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-publish-setting-password"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-987">Azure 发布设置密码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-987">Azure publish setting password</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-988">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-988">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-989">字符串"userpwd="后跟字母数字字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-989">The string "userpwd=" followed by an alphanumeric string.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-990">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-990">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-991">字符串"userpwd="</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-991">the string "userpwd="</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-992">60 个小写字母或数字的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-992">any combination of 60 lowercase letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-993">双引号 (") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-993">a quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-994">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-994">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-995">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-995">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-996">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-996">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-997">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-997">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-998">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-998">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-999">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-999">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
<!--Azure Publish Setting Password-->
<Entity id="75f4cc8a-a68e-49e5-89ce-fa8f03d286a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords" />
       <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
           <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
       </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1003">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1003">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1004">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1004">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1005">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1005">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1006">沙盒</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1006">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1007">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1007">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1008">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1008">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1009">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1009">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1010">testacs。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1010">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1011">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1011">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1012">s-int。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1012">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1013">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1013">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-redis-cache-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1014">Azure Redis 缓存连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1014">Azure Redis cache connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1015">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1015">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1016">字符串"redis.cache.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1016">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1017">net"，后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串，包括字符串"password"或"pwd"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1017">net" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1018">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1018">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1019">字符串"redis.cache.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1019">the string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1020">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1020">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1021">1-200 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1021">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1022">字符串"password"或"pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1022">the string "password" or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1023">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1023">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1024">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1024">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1025">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1025">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1026">小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1026">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1027">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1027">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1028">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1028">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1029">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1029">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1030">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1030">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1031">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1031">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1032">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1032">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1033">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1033">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Redis Cache Connection String-->
<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1034">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1034">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1035">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1035">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1036"> (，从技术上说，此敏感信息类型使用正则表达式（而不是关键字列表）标识这些) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1036">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1039">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1039">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1040">沙盒</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1040">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1041">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1041">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1042">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1042">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1043">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1043">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1044">testacs。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1044">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1045">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1045">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1046">s-int。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1046">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1047">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1047">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1048">Azure SAS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1048">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1049">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1049">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1050">字符串"sig"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1050">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1051">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1051">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1052">字符串"sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1052">the string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1053">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1053">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1054">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1054">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1055">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1055">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1056">小写或大写字母、数字或百分号之间的 43-53 个字符的任意组合 (%) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1056">any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1057">字符串"%3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1057">the string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1058">任何不是小写或大写字母、数字或百分号的字符 (%) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1058">any character that isn't a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1059">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1059">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1060">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1060">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1061">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1061">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1062">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1062">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1063">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureSAS查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1063">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-service-bus-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1064">Azure 服务总线连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1064">Azure service bus connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1065">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1065">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1069">字符串"EndPoint"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1069">the string "EndPoint"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1070">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1070">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1071">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1071">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1072">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1072">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1073">1-200 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1073">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1074">字符串"servicebus.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1074">the string "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1075">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1075">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1076">1-200 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1076">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1077">字符串"SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1077">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1078">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1078">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1079">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1079">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1080">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1080">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1081">小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1081">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1082">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1082">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1083">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1083">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1084">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1084">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1085">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1085">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1086">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1086">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1087">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1087">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1088">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1088">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1103">Azure 存储帐户密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1103">Azure storage account key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1104">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1104">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1105">字符串"DefaultEndpointsProtocol"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串，包括字符串"AccountKey"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1105">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "AccountKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1106">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1106">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1107">字符串"DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1107">the string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1108">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1108">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1109">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1109">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1110">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1110">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1111">1-200 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1111">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1112">字符串"AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1112">the string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1113">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1113">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1114">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1114">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1115">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1115">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1116">小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1116">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1117">两个等 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1117">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1118">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1118">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1119">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1119">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1120">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1120">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1121">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1121">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1122">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1122">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1123">正则表达式CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1123">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1124">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1124">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1142">Azure 存储常规 (帐户密钥) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1142">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1143">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1143">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1144">86 个小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) 的任意组合，前面或后跟以下模式中列出的字符。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1144">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1145">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1145">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1146">零到大于符号 (>) 、撇号 (') 、等号 (=) 、引号 (") 或数字符号 (#) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1146">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1147">小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1147">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1148">两个等 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1148">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1149">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1149">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1150">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1150">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1151">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1151">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1152">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1152">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1153">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1153">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1154">比利时驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1154">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1155">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1155">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1156">不带空格和分隔符的 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1156">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1157">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1157">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1158">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1158">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1159">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1159">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1160">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1160">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1161">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1161">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1162">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1162">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1163">正则表达式查找  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1163">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1164">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1164">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Belgium Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d89fd329-9324-433c-b687-2c37bd5166f3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1297">比利时国家号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1297">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1298">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1298">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1299">11 个数字加上可选的分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1299">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1300">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1300">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1301">11 个数字加分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1301">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1302">YY 格式的六个数字和两个可选句点。出生日期的 MM.DD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1302">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1303">点、短划线、空格中的可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1303">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1304">三个连续的数字 (男性为奇数，即使对于男性) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1304">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1305">点、短划线、空格中的可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1305">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1306">两个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1306">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1307">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1307">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1308">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1308">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1309">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1309">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1310">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1310">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1311">函数 Func_belgium_national_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1311">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1312">找到 Keyword_belgium_national_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1312">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1313">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1313">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1314">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1314">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1315">函数 Func_belgium_national_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1315">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1316">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1316">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
       <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1375">比利时护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1375">Belgium passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1376">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1376">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1377">两个字母后跟 6 个数字，没有空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1377">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1378">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1378">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1379">两个字母，后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1379">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1380">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1380">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1381">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1381">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1382">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1382">Definition</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1383">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1383">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1384">正则表达式查找  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1384">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1385">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1385">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1386">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date2` 格式为 DD MM YY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1386">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1387">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1387">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1388">正则表达式查找  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1388">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1389">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1389">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d7b1315b-21ca-4774-a32a-596010ff78fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1416">比利时增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1416">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1417">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1417">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1418">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1418">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1419">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1419">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1420">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1420">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1421">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1421">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1422">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1422">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1423">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1423">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1424">12 字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1424">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1425">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1425">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1426">12 字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1426">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1427">字母 B 或 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1427">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1428">字母 E 或 e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1428">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1429">数字 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1429">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1430">从 1 到 9 的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1430">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1431">可选点或连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1431">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1432">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1432">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1433">可选点或连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1433">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1434">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1434">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1435">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1435">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1436">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1436">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1437">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1437">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1438">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1438">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1439">函数Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1439">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1440">找到来自Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1440">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1441">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1441">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1442">函数Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1442">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1443">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1443">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1444">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1444">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1454">巴西 CPF 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1454">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1455">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1455">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1456">11 个数字（包括校验位），可以格式化，也可以非格式化</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1456">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1457">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1457">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1458">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1458">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1459">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1459">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1460">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1460">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1461">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1461">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1462">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1462">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1463">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1463">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1464">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1464">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1465">两个数字是检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1465">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1466">无格式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1466">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1467">11 个数字，其中最后两个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1467">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1468">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1468">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1469">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1469">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1470">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1470">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1471">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1471">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1472">函数 Func_brazil_cpf 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1472">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1473">找到 Keyword_brazil_cpf 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1473">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1474">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1474">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1475">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1475">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1476">函数 Func_brazil_cpf 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1476">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1477">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1477">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1478">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1478">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_cpf"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1479">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1479">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1480">CPF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1480">CPF</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1481">标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1481">Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1482">注册</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1482">Registration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1483">收入</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1483">Revenue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1484">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1484">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1485">中年</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1485">Imposto</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1486">Identificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1486">Identificação</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1487">Inscrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1487">Inscrição</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1488">Receita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1488">Receita</span></span> 

   
## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1489">CNPJ (巴西法律实体) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1489">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1490">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1490">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1491">14 个数字（包括注册号、分行号码和校验位），再加上分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1491">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1492">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1492">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1493">14 个数字，再加上分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1493">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1494">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1494">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1495">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1495">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1496">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1496">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1497">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1497">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1498">三个数字 (前八个数字是注册号码) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1498">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1499">正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1499">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1500">四位数分支号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1500">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1501">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1501">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1502">两个数字是检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1502">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1503">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1503">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1504">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1504">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1505">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1505">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1506">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1506">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1507">函数 Func_brazil_cnpj 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1507">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1508">找到 Keyword_brazil_cnpj 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1508">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1509">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1509">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1510">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1510">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1511">函数 Func_brazil_cnpj 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1511">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1512">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1512">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1514">Keyword_brazil_cnpj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1514">Keyword_brazil_cnpj</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1523">商业版</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1523">Business</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1524">公司</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1524">Company</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1525">CNPJ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1525">CNPJ</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1526">Cadastro Nacional da Pessoa Jurídica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1526">Cadastro Nacional da Pessoa Jurídica</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1527">Cadastro Geral de Contribuintes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1527">Cadastro Geral de Contribuintes</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1528">CGC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1528">CGC</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1530">Pessoas jurídicas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1530">Pessoas jurídicas</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1534">巴西国家身份证 (RG) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1534">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1535">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1535">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1536">Registro Geral (旧格式) ：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1536">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1537">Registro de Identidade (RIC)  (新格式) ：11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1537">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1538">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1538">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1539">Registro Geral（旧格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1539">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1540">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1540">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1541">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1541">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1542">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1542">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1543">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1543">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1544">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1544">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1545">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1545">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1546">一个数字，是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1546">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1547">Registro de Identidade (RIC)  (新格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1547">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1548">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1548">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1549">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1549">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1550">一个数字，是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1550">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1551">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1551">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1552">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1552">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1553">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1553">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1554">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1554">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1555">函数 Func_brazil_rg 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1555">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1556">找到 Keyword_brazil_rg 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1556">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1557">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1557">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
      <Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1558">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1558">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1559">Keyword_brazil_rg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1559">Keyword_brazil_rg</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1560">Cédula de identidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1560">Cédula de identidade</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1561">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1561">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1562">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1562">national id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1563">número de rregistro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1563">número de rregistro</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1564">registro de Iidentidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1564">registro de Iidentidade</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1565">registro geral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1565">registro geral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1567">RIC (关键字区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1567">RIC (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span> 


## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1568">保加利亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1568">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1569">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1569">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1570">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1570">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1571">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1571">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1572">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1572">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1573">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1573">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1574">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1574">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1575">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1575">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1576">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1576">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1577">正则表达式查找  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1577">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1578">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1578">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="66d39258-94c2-43b2-804b-aa312258e54b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>    
```
