## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1705">保加利亚统一编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1705">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1706">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1706">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1707">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1707">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1708">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1708">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1709">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1709">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1710">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1710">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1711">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1711">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1712">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1712">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1713">不带空格和分隔符的 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1713">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1714">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1714">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1715">不带空格和分隔符的 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1715">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1716">六个数字，对应于 YYMMDD (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1716">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1717">两个数字，对应于出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1717">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1718">对应于性别的一个数字：男性的偶数位数和男性的奇数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1718">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1719">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1719">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1720">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1720">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1721">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1721">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1722">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1722">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1723">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1723">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1724">函数  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1724">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1725">找到 的  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1725">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1726">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1726">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1727">函数  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1727">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1772">保加利亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1772">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1773">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1773">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1774">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1774">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1775">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1775">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1776">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1776">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1777">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1777">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1778">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1778">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1779">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1779">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1780">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1780">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1781">正则表达式查找  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1781">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1782">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1782">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1783">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1783">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1784">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1784">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1785">正则表达式查找  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1785">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1786">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1786">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="f7172b82-c588-4216-845e-4e54e397f29a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1787">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1787">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1788">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1788">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1789">passport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1789">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1790">passport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1790">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1791">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1791">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1792">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1792">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1793">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1793">passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1794">passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1794">passport no</span></span>

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1806">加拿大银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1806">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1807">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1807">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1808">7 个或 12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1808">7 or 12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1809">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1809">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1810">加拿大银行帐号是 7 个或 12 个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1810">A Canada Bank Account Number is 7 or 12 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1811">加拿大银行帐户的银行代号是：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1811">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1812">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1812">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1813">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1813">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1814">三个数字 OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1814">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1815">零"0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1815">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1816">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1816">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1817">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1817">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1818">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1818">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1819">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1819">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1820">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1820">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1821">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1821">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1822">找到 Keyword_canada_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1822">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1823">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1823">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1824">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1824">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1825">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1825">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1826">找到 Keyword_canada_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1826">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1850">加拿大驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1850">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1851">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1851">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1852">因省而异</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1852">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1853">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1853">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1854">各种模式，涵盖艾伯塔、 不列颠哥伦比亚、 马尼托巴、 新不伦瑞克、 纽芬兰/拉布拉多、 新斯科舍、 安大略、 爱德华王子岛，魁北克和萨斯喀彻温</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1854">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1855">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1855">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1856">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1856">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1857">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1857">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1858">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1858">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1859">函数 Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1859">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1860">找到 Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1860">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1861">找到 Keyword_canada_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1861">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_quebec_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_quebec_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_saskatchewan_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_saskatchewan_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1997">加拿大卫生服务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1997">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1998">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1998">Format</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-1999">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-1999">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2000">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2000">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2001">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2001">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2002">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2002">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2003">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2003">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2004">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2004">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2005">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2005">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2006">正则表达式 Regex_canada_health_service_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2006">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2007">找到 Keyword_canada_health_service_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2007">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2008">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2008">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_canada_health_service_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2009">Keyword_canada_health_service_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2009">Keyword_canada_health_service_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2010">personal health number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2010">personal health number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2011">patient information</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2011">patient information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2012">health services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2012">health services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2013">speciality services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2013">speciality services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2014">automobile accident</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2014">automobile accident</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2015">patient hospital</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2015">patient hospital</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2016">一些</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2016">psychiatrist</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2017">workers compensation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2017">workers compensation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2018">残障</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2018">disability</span></span>

      
## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2019">加拿大护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2019">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2020">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2020">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2021">两个小写字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2021">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2022">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2022">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2023">两个小写字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2023">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2024">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2024">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2025">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2025">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2026">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2026">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2027">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2027">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2028">正则表达式 Regex_canada_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2028">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2029">找到来自Keyword_canada_passport_number或Keyword_passport关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2029">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2059">加拿大个人健康标识号 (PHIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2059">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2060">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2060">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2061">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2061">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2062">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2062">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2063">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2063">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2064">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2064">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2065">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2065">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2066">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2066">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2067">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2067">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2068">正则表达式 Regex_canada_phin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2068">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2069">至少找到了两个来自Keyword_canada_phin或Keyword_canada_provinces关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2069">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2102">加拿大社会保险号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2102">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2103">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2103">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2104">九个数字（可选连字符或空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2104">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2105">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2105">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2106">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2106">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2107">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2107">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2108">连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2108">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2109">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2109">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2110">连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2110">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2111">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2111">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2112">无格式：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2112">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2113">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2113">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2114">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2114">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2115">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2115">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2116">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2116">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2117">函数 Func_canadian_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2117">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2118">至少两个以下任意组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2118">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2119">找到 Keyword_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2119">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2120">找到 Keyword_sin_collaborative 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2120">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2121">函数 Func_eu_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2121">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2122">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2122">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2123">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2123">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2124">函数 Func_unformatted_canadian_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2124">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2125">找到 Keyword_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2125">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2126">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2126">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2127">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2127">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2128">Keyword_sin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2128">Keyword_sin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2129">sin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2129">sin</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2130">social insurance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2130">social insurance</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2131">numero d'assurance sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2131">numero d'assurance sociale</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2132">sins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2132">sins</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2133">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2133">ssn</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2134">ssns</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2134">ssns</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2135">social security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2135">social security</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2136">numero d'assurance social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2136">numero d'assurance social</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2137">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2137">national identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2138">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2138">national id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2139">sin#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2139">sin#</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2140">soc ins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2140">soc ins</span></span>

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2151">智利身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2151">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2152">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2152">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2153">七到八个数字加上分隔符一个检查数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2153">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2154">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2154">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2155">七到八个数字加分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2155">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2156">一到两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2156">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2157">可选时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2157">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2158">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2158">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2159">可选时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2159">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2160">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2160">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2161">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2161">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2162">一个数字或 (不区分大小写) 一个数字或字母，这是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2162">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2163">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2163">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2164">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2164">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2165">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2165">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2166">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2166">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2167">函数 Func_chile_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2167">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2168">找到 Keyword_chile_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2168">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2169">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2169">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2170">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2170">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2171">函数 Func_chile_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2171">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2172">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2172">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2193">identidad número</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2193">identidad número</span></span>

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2209">中国居民身份证 (中国) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2209">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2210">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2210">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2211">18 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2211">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2212">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2212">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2213">18 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2213">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2214">六个数字，表示地址代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2214">six digits that are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2215">八个数字，格式为 YYYYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2215">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2216">三个数字，表示订单代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2216">three digits that are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2217">一个数字，是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2217">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2218">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2218">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2219">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2219">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2220">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2220">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2221">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2221">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2222">函数 Func_china_resident_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2222">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2223">找到 Keyword_china_resident_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2223">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2224">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2224">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2225">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2225">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2226">函数 Func_china_resident_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2226">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2227">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2227">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2228">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2228">Keywords</span></span>

### <a name="keyword_china_resident_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2229">Keyword_china_resident_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2229">Keyword_china_resident_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2230">Resident Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2230">Resident Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2231">中国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2231">PRC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2232">National Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2232">National Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2233">身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2233">身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2234">居民 身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2234">居民 身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2235">居民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2235">居民身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2236">鉴定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2236">鉴定</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2237">身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2237">身分證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2238">居民身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2238">居民 身份證</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2239">鑑定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2239">鑑定</span></span> 

   
## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2240">信用卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2240">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2241">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2241">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2242">14 到 16 个数字，可以格式化或无格式 (dddddd) 且必须通过 Luhn 测试。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2242">14 to 16 digits that can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and that must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2243">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2243">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2244">复杂而强大的模式，用于检测全球所有重要品牌的卡，包括 Visa、MasterCard、Discover Card、JCB、American Express、名片和第三者卡。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2244">Complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2245">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2245">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2246">是，Luhn 校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2246">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2247">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2247">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2248">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2248">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2249">函数 Func_credit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2249">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2250">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2250">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2251">找到 Keyword_cc_verification 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2251">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2252">找到 Keyword_cc_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2252">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2253">函数 Func_expiration_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2253">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2254">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2254">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2255">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2255">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2256">函数 Func_credit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2256">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2257">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2257">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2517">克罗地亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2517">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2518">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2518">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2519">八个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2519">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2520">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2520">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2521">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2521">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2522">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2522">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2523">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2523">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2524">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2524">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2525">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2525">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2526">正则表达式查找  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2526">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2527">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2527">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="005b3ef1-47dd-4e68-bb02-c6db484d00f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2651">克罗地亚身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2651">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2652">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家标识号敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2652">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2653">它作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2653">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2654">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2654">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2655">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2655">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2656">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2656">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2657">九个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2657">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2658">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2658">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2659">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2659">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2660">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2660">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2661">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2661">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2662">函数 Func_croatia_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2662">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2663">找到 Keyword_croatia_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2663">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2694">克罗地亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2694">Croatia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2695">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2695">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2696">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2696">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2697">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2697">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2698">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2698">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2699">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2699">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2700">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2700">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2701">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2701">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2702">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2702">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2703">正则表达式查找  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2703">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2704">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2704">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2705">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2705">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2706">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2706">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2707">正则表达式查找  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2707">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2708">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2708">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Croatia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7d7a729d-32d8-4204-8d01-d5e6a6c25581" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2709">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2709">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number_common"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2710">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2710">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2717">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2717">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2718">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2718">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2719">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2719">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2720">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2720">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2721">Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2721">Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2722">broj putov一</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2722">broj putovnice</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2725">br putov一</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2725">br putovnice</span></span>
   
## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2726">克罗地亚个人标识 (OIB) 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2726">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2727">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2727">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2728">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2728">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2729">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2729">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2730">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2730">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2731">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2731">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2732">最终数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2732">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2733">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2733">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2734">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2734">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2735">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2735">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2736">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2736">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2737">函数 Func_croatia_oib_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2737">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2738">找到来自Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2738">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2739">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2739">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2740">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2740">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2741">函数 Func_croatia_oib_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2741">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2742">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2742">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2773">塞浦路斯驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2773">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2774">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2774">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2775">不带空格和分隔符的 12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2775">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2776">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2776">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2777">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2777">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2778">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2778">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2779">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2779">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2780">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2780">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2781">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2781">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2782">正则表达式查找  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2782">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2783">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2783">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="356fa104-f9ac-4aff-a0e4-2e6e65ea06c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2908">塞浦路斯身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2908">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2909">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2909">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2910">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2910">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2911">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2911">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2912">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2912">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2913">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2913">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2914">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2914">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2915">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2915">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2916">不带空格和分隔符的 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2916">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2917">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2917">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2918">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2918">10 digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2919">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2919">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2920">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2920">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2921">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2921">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2922">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2922">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2923">正则表达式查找  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2923">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2924">找到 的  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2924">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2925">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2925">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2926">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2926">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2927">id card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2927">id card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2928">标识卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2928">identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2929">kim且 karti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2929">kimlik karti</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2930">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2930">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2931">个人 ID 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2931">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2932">ταυτοτητασ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2932">ταυτοτητασ</span></span>


## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2933">塞浦路斯护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2933">Cyprus passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2934">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2934">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2935">一个字母后跟 6-8 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2935">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2936">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2936">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2937">一个字母后跟六到八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2937">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2938">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2938">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2939">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2939">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2940">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2940">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2941">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2941">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2942">正则表达式查找  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2942">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2943">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2943">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2944">正则表达式查找 `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` DD/MM/YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2944">The regular expression `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD/MM/YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2945">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2945">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2946">正则表达式查找  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2946">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2947">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2947">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>  
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="9193e2e8-7f8c-43c1-a274-ac40d651936f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2976">塞浦路斯税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2976">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2977">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2977">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2978">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2978">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2979">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2979">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2980">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2980">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2981">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2981">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2982">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2982">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2983">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2983">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2984">指定模式中的八个数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2984">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2985">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2985">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2986">八个数字和一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2986">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2987">"0"或"9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2987">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2988">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2988">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2989">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2989">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2990">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2990">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2991">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2991">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2992">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2992">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2993">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2993">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2994">函数  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2994">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2995">找到 的  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2995">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2996">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2996">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-2997">函数  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-2997">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
