## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3025">捷克驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3025">Czech driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3026">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3026">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3027">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3027">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3028">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3028">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3029">八个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3029">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3030">字母"E" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3030">letter 'E' (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3031">一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3031">a letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3032">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3032">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3033">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3033">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3034">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3034">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3035">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3035">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3036">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3036">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3037">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3037">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3038">正则表达式查找  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3038">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3039">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3039">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <Entity id="86b40d3b-d8ea-4c36-aab0-ef9416a6769c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3165">捷克护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3165">Czech passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3166">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3166">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3167">八个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3167">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3168">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3168">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3169">八个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3169">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3170">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3170">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3171">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3171">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3172">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3172">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3173">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3173">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3174">正则表达式查找  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3174">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3175">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3175">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3176">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3176">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3177">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3177">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3178">正则表达式查找  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3178">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3179">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3179">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Czech Republic Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7bcd8ce8-5e92-4bbe-bc92-fa669f0369fa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3201">捷克个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3201">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3202">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3202">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3203">九个数字，带可选正斜杠 (旧格式) 10 个数字，带可选正斜杠 (新格式) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3203">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) 10 digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3204">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3204">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3205">九个数字 (旧格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3205">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3206">六个数字，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3206">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3207">可选正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3207">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3208">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3208">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3209">10 个数字 (新格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3209">10 digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3210">六个数字，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3210">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3211">可选正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3211">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3212">四个数字，其中最后一个数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3212">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3213">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3213">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3214">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3214">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3215">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3215">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3216">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3216">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3217">函数 Func_czech_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3217">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3218">找到 Keyword_czech_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3218">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3219">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3219">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3220">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3220">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3221">函数Func_czech_id_card_new_format查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3221">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3222">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3222">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3269">丹麦驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3269">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3270">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3270">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3271">八个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3271">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3272">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3272">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3273">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3273">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3274">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3274">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3275">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3275">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3276">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3276">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3277">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3277">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3278">正则表达式查找  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3278">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3279">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3279">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="98a95812-6203-451a-a220-d39870ebef0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3403">丹麦护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3403">Denmark passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3404">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3404">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3405">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3405">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3406">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3406">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3407">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3407">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3408">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3408">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3409">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3409">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3410">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3410">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3411">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3411">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3412">正则表达式查找  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3412">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3413">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3413">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3414">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date2` 格式为 DD MM YY 的日期或 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 找到的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3414">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3415">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3415">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3416">正则表达式查找  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3416">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3417">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3417">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="25e8c47e-e6fe-4884-a211-74898f8c0196" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3437">丹麦个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3437">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3438">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3438">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3439">10 个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3439">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3440">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3440">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3441">10 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3441">10 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3442">六个数字，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3442">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3443">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3443">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3444">四个数字，其中最后一个数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3444">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3445">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3445">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3446">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3446">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3447">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3447">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3448">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3448">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3449">正则表达式Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3449">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3450">找到 Keyword_denmark_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3450">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3451">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3451">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3452">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3452">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3453">正则表达式Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3453">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3454">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3454">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3526">管制局 (DEA) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3526">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3527">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3527">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3528">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3528">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3529">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3529">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3530">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3530">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3531">一个字母 (可能) 不区分大小写：abcdefghjklmnprstux，这是一个注册表代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3531">one letter (not case-sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3532">一个字母 (不区分大小写) ，即注册人姓氏或数字"9"的第一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3532">one letter (not case-sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name or digit '9'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3533">七个数字，最后一个数字是检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3533">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3534">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3534">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3535">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3535">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3536">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3536">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3537">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3537">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3538">函数 Func_dea_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3538">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3539">找到的 `Keyword_dea_number` 关键字来自</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3539">A keyword from `Keyword_dea_number` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3540">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3540">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3541">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3541">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3542">函数 Func_dea_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3542">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3543">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3543">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- DEA Number -->
    <Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.1207.000" maxEngineVersion="15.20.3134.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3135.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3544">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3544">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_dea_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3545">Keyword_dea_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3545">Keyword_dea_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3546">dea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3546">dea</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3547">dea#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3547">dea#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3548">一些强制执行管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3548">drug enforcement administration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3549">犯罪管制机构</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3549">drug enforcement agency</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3550">爱沙尼亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3550">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3551">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3551">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3552">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3552">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3553">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3553">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3554">两个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3554">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3555">字母"ET" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3555">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3556">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3556">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3557">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3557">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3558">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3558">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3559">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3559">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3560">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3560">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3561">正则表达式查找  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3561">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3562">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3562">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="51da8171-da70-4cc1-9d65-055a59ca4f83" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3689">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3689">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3690">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3690">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3691">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3691">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3692">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3692">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3693">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3693">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3694">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3694">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3695">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3695">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3696">11 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3696">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3697">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3697">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3698">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3698">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3699">一个数字，对应于性生活和年龄 (奇数男性，偶数男性;1-2：19 世纪;3-4：20 世纪;5-6：21 世纪) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3699">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3700">六个数字，对应于 YYMMDD (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3700">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3701">三个数字，对应于同一日期出生日期的分隔人的序列号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3701">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3702">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3702">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3703">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3703">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3704">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3704">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3705">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3705">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3706">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3706">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3707">函数  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3707">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3708">找到 的  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3708">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3709">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3709">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3710">函数  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3710">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3743">爱沙尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3743">Estonia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3744">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3744">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3745">一个字母后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3745">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3746">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3746">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3747">一个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3747">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3748">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3748">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3749">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3749">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3750">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3750">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3751">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3751">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3752">正则表达式查找  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3752">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3753">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3753">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3754">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3754">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3755">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3755">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3756">正则表达式查找  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3756">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3757">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3757">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61f7073a-509e-425b-a754-bc01bb5d5b8c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3762">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3762">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3763">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3763">passports</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3766">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3766">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3767">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3767">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3768">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3768">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3769">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3769">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3770">Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3770">Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3771">eesti kodaniku passi number passinumbrid document number document no dokumendi nr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3771">eesti kodaniku pass passi number passinumbrid document number document no dokumendi nr</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_date"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3772">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3772">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span></span>

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3775">欧盟借记卡号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3775">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3776">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3776">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3777">16 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3777">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3778">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3778">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3779">复杂而可靠的模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3779">Complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3780">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3780">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3781">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3781">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3782">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3782">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3783">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3783">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3784">函数 Func_eu_debit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3784">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3785">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3785">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3786">找到 Keyword_eu_debit_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3786">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3787">找到 Keyword_card_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3787">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3788">找到 Keyword_card_security_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3788">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3789">找到 Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3789">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3790">函数 Func_expiration_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3790">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-3791">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-3791">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4238">芬兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4238">Finland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4239">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4239">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4240">10 个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4240">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4241">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4241">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4242">10 个数字，包含连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4242">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4243">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4243">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4244">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4244">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4245">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4245">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4246">数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4246">a digit or letter</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4247">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4247">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4248">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4248">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4249">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4249">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4250">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4250">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4251">正则表达式查找  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4251">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4252">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4252">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Finland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="bb3b27a3-79bd-4ac4-81a7-f9fca3c7d1a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4383">芬兰欧洲健康保险号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4383">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4384">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4384">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4385">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4385">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4386">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4386">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4387">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4387">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4388">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4388">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4389">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4389">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4390">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4390">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4391">20 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4391">20-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4392">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4392">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4393">20 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4393">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4394">10 个数字 - 8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4394">10 digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4395">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4395">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4396">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4396">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4397">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4397">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4398">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4398">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4399">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4399">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4400">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4400">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4401">正则表达式Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4401">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4402">找到来自Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4402">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4420">芬兰国家/区 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4420">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4421">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4421">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4422">六个数字加一个字符，表示一世纪加三个数字加一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4422">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4423">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4423">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4424">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4424">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4425">六个数字，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4425">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4426">century marker (either '-'， '+' or 'a') </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4426">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4427">三位数的个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4427">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4428">一个数字或 (不区分大小写) 检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4428">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4429">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4429">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4430">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4430">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4431">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4431">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4432">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4432">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4433">函数Func_finnish_national_id查找与模式匹配的内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4433">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4434">找到来自Keyword_finnish_national_id的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4434">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4435">校验和传递</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4435">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4436">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4436">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4437">函数Func_finnish_national_id查找与模式匹配的内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4437">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4438">校验和传递</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4438">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4487">芬兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4487">Finland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4488">此敏感信息类型实体在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中可用，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4488">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4489">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4489">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4490">九个字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4490">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4491">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4491">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4492">九个字母和数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4492">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4493">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4493">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4494">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4494">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4495">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4495">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4496">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4496">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4497">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4497">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4498">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4498">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4499">正则表达式查找 `Regex_finland_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4499">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4500">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_finland_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4500">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4501">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4501">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4502">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4502">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4503">正则表达式查找 `Regex_finland_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4503">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4504">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_finland_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4504">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_finland_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4517">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4517">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4518">suomalainen passi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4518">suomalainen passi</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4521">passin numero#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4521">passin numero#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4522">passin numero。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4522">passin numero.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4524">passi number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4524">passi number</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_date"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4525">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4525">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4526">发行日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4526">date of issue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4527">到期日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4527">date of expiry</span></span>

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4528">法国驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4528">France driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4529">此敏感信息类型实体在欧盟驾驶证号码敏感信息类型中可用，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4529">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4530">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4530">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4531">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4531">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4532">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4532">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4533">12 个数字，会对类似模式（如法国电话号码）进行验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4533">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4534">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4534">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4535">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4535">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4536">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4536">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4537">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4537">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4538">函数Func_french_drivers_license查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4538">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4539">找到Keyword_french_drivers_license关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4539">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4666">法国健康保险号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4666">France health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4667">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4667">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4668">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4668">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4669">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4669">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4670">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4670">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4671">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4671">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4672">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4672">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4673">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4673">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4674">21 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4674">21-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4675">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4675">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4676">21 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4676">21-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4677">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4677">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4678">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4678">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4679">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4679">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4680">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4680">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4681">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4681">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4682">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4682">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4683">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4683">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4684">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4684">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4685">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4685">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4686">正则表达式Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4686">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4687">找到来自Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4687">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4688">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4688">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4689">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4689">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4690">insurance card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4690">insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4691">carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4691">carte vitale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4692">carte d'assuré social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4692">carte d'assuré social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4693">法国国家/ (CNI) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4693">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4694">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4694">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4695">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4695">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4696">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4696">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4697">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4697">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4698">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4698">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4699">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4699">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4700">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4700">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4701">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4701">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4702">正则表达式 Regex_france_cni 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4702">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4703">找到来自Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4703">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4704">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4704">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4705">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4705">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4706">card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4706">card number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4712">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4712">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4713">national identity</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4713">national identity</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4714">nationalidno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4714">nationalidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4715">numéro d'assurance mal一e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4715">numéro d'assurance maladie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4716">numéro de carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4716">numéro de carte vitale</span></span>

   
## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4717">法国护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4717">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4718">欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中提供了此敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4718">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4719">它作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4719">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4720">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4720">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4721">九个数字和字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4721">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4722">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4722">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4723">九个数字和字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4723">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4724">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4724">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4725">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4725">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4726">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4726">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4727">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4727">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4728">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4728">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4729">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4729">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4730">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4730">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4731">函数 `Func_fr_passport` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4731">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4732">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4732">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4733">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` 格式为 DD MM YYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4733">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4734">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4734">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4735">函数 `Func_fr_passport` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4735">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4736">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4736">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- France Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4749">Keywords_france_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4749">Keywords_france_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4755">passeportnon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4755">passeportnon</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_date"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4764">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4764">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span></span>
