## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4767">法国社会保险号码 (INSEE) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4767">France social security number (INSEE)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4768">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4768">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4769">15 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4769">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4770">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4770">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4771">必须匹配两种模式之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4771">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4772">13 个数字，后跟一个空格，后跟两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4772">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4773">或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4773">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4774">15 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4774">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4775">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4775">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4776">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4776">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4777">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4777">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4778">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4778">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4779">函数 `Func_french_insee` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4779">The function `Func_french_insee` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4780">找到 Keyword_fr_insee 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4780">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4781">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4781">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4782">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4782">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4783">函数Func_french_insee或Func_fr_insee找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4783">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4784">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4784">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France INSEE -->
    <Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

no. d'identite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-p134">no. d'identite</span></span>

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4815">法国税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4815">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4816">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4816">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4817">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4817">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4818">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4818">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4819">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4819">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4820">一个数字，必须为 0、1、2 或 3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4820">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4821">一位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4821">One digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4822">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4822">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4823">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4823">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4824">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4824">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4825">三个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4825">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4826">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4826">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4827">三个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4827">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4828">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4828">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4829">三个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4829">Three check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4830">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4830">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4831">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4831">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4832">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4832">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4833">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4833">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4834">函数  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4834">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4835">找到 的  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4835">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4836">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4836">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4837">函数  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4837">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4838">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4838">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4839">Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4839">Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4840">numéro d'identification fiscale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4840">numéro d'identification fiscale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4841">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4841">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4842">tax identification no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4842">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4843">tax identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4843">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4844">tax no#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4844">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4845">tax no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4845">tax no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4846">tax number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4846">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4847">tax registration number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4847">tax registration number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4848">已#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4848">taxid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4849">一些#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4849">taxidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4850">一些#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4850">taxidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4851">taxno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4851">taxno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4852">taxnumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4852">taxnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4853">taxnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4853">taxnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4854">tin id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4854">tin id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4855">tin no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4855">tin no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4856">tin#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4856">tin#</span></span>


## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4857">法国增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4857">France value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4858">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4858">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4859">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4859">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4860">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4860">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4861">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4861">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4862">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4862">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4863">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4863">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4864">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4864">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4865">13 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4865">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4866">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4866">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4867">13 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4867">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4868">两个字母 - FR (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4868">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4869">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4869">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4870">两个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4870">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4871">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4871">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4872">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4872">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4873">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4873">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4874">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4874">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4875">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4875">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4876">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4876">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4877">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4877">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4878">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4878">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4879">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4879">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4880">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4880">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4881">函数Func_france_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4881">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4882">找到来自Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4882">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4883">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4883">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4884">函数Func_france_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4884">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4887">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4887">vat number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4889">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4889">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4890">增值税</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4890">value added tax</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4891">siren identification no numéro d'identification taxe surur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4891">siren identification no numéro d'identification taxe sur valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4892">taxeur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4892">taxe valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4893">taxe sur laurur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4893">taxe sur la valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4894">n° tva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4894">n° tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4895">numéro de tva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4895">numéro de tva</span></span>

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4897">德国驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4897">Germany driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4898">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驾驶证号码敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4898">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4899">它作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4899">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4900">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4900">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4901">11 个数字和字母的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4901">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4902">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4902">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4903">11 个数字和字母 (不区分) 大小写：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4903">11 digits and letters (not case-sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4904">数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4904">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4905">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4905">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4906">六个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4906">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4907">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4907">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4908">数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4908">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4909">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4909">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4910">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4910">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4911">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4911">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4912">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4912">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4913">函数 Func_german_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4913">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4914">找到 Keyword_german_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4914">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-4915">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-4915">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5064">德国身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5064">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5065">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5065">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5066">自 2010 年 11 月 1 日起：九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5066">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5067">从 1987 年 4 月 1 日到 2010 年 10 月 31 日：10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5067">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5068">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5068">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5069">自 2010 年 11 月 1 日起：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5069">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5070">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5070">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5071">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5071">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5072">从 1987 年 4 月 1 日到 2010 年 10 月 31 日：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5072">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5073">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5073">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5074">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5074">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5075">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5075">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5076">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5076">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5077">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5077">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5078">正则表达式 Regex_germany_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5078">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5079">找到 Keyword_germany_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5079">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5080">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5080">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5081">Keyword_germany_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5081">Keyword_germany_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5082">aus一s</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5082">ausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5083">gpid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5083">gpid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5084">identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5084">identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5085">identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5085">identifikation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5086">identifizierungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5086">identifizierungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5087">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5087">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5088">标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5088">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5089">id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5089">id-nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5090">个人 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5090">personal id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5091">personalaus一s</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5091">personalausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5092">persönliche id nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5092">persönliche id nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5093">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5093">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5094">persönliche-id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5094">persönliche-id-nummer</span></span>


## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5095">德国护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5095">Germany passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5096">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5096">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5097">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5097">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5098">10 个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5098">10 digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5099">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5099">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5100">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5100">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5101">第一个字符是此集合中的数字或字母 (C、F、G、H、J、K) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5101">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5102">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5102">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5103">此集合中的五个数字或字母 (C、-H、J-N、P、R、T、V-Z) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5103">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5104">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5104">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5105">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5105">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5106">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5106">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5107">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5107">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5108">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5108">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5109">函数 Func_german_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5109">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5110">找到 或 `Keyword_german_passport` `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5110">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5111">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5111">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5112">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5112">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5113">函数 Func_german_passport_data 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5113">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5114">找到 或 `Keyword_german_passport` `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5114">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5115">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5115">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5138">德国税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5138">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5139">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5139">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5140">11 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5140">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5141">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5141">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5142">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5142">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5143">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5143">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5144">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5144">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5145">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5145">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5146">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5146">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5147">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5147">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5148">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5148">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5149">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5149">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5150">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5150">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5151">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5151">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5152">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5152">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5153">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5153">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5154">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5154">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5155">函数  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5155">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5156">找到 的  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5156">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5157">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5157">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5158">函数  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5158">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5184">德国增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5184">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5185">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5185">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5186">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5186">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5187">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5187">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5188">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5188">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5189">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5189">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5190">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5190">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5191">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5191">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5192">11 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5192">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5193">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5193">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5194">11 字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5194">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5195">字母 D 或 d</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5195">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5196">字母 E 或 e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5196">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5197">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5197">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5198">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5198">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5199">可选空格或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5199">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5200">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5200">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5201">可选空格或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5201">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5202">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5202">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5203">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5203">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5204">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5204">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5205">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5205">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5206">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5206">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5207">函数Func_germany_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5207">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5208">找到来自Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5208">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5209">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5209">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5210">函数Func_germany_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5210">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5211">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5211">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5212">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5212">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5213">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5213">vat number</span></span>

## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5220">希腊驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5220">Greece driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5221">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驾驶证号码敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5221">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5222">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5222">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5223">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5223">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5224">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5224">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5225">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5225">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5226">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5226">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5227">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5227">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5228">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5228">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5229">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5229">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5230">正则表达式查找  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5230">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5231">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5231">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="7a2200b5-aacf-4e3c-ab36-136d3e68b7da" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5352">Keywords_greece_eu_driver s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5352">Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5353">δεια οδήγησης</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5353">δεια οδήγησης</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5354">Adeia odigisis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5354">Adeia odigisis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5355">Άδεια οδήγησης</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5355">Άδεια οδήγησης</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5356">Δίπλωμα οδήγησης</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5356">Δίπλωμα οδήγησης</span></span>


## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5357">希腊国民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5357">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5358">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5358">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5359">7-8 个字母和数字组合加一个短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5359">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5360">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5360">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5361">七个字母和数字（旧格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5361">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5362">一个字母（希腊字母表中的任一字母） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5362">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5363">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5363">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5364">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5364">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5365">八个字母和数字（新格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5365">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5366">大写字符同时出现在希腊和拉丁字母表中的两个字母 (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5366">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5367">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5367">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5368">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5368">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5369">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5369">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5370">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5370">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5371">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5371">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5372">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5372">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5373">正则表达式 Regex_greece_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5373">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5374">找到 Keyword_greece_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5374">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5375">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5375">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5376">正则表达式 Regex_greece_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5376">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5377">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5377">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_greece_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5378">Keyword_greece_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5378">Keyword_greece_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5379">greek id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5379">greek id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5380">希腊语国家/区 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5380">greek national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5381">希腊语个人 ID 卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5381">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5382">希腊语政府 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5382">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5383">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5383">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5384">tautotita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5384">tautotita</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5385">ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5385">ταυτότητα</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5386">ταυτότητας</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5386">ταυτότητας</span></span>


## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5387">希腊护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5387">Greece passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5388">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5388">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5389">两个字母后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5389">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5390">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5390">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5391">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5391">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5392">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5392">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5393">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5393">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5394">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5394">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5395">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5395">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5396">正则表达式查找  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5396">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5397">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5397">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5398">正则表达式查找 `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` DD MMM YY 格式的日期 (示例 - 8 月 19) 找到关键字 `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5398">The regular expression `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM YY (Example - 28 Aug 19) or a keyword from `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5399">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5399">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5400">正则表达式查找  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5400">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5401">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5401">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7e65eb47-cdf9-4f52-8f90-2a27d5ee67e3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5403">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5403">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5406">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5406">passportid</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5409">passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5409">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5410">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5410">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5411">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5411">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5412">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5412">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5413">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5413">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5414">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5414">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5415">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5415">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5416">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5416">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5417">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5417">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span></span>


## <a name="greece-social-security-number-amka"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5418">希腊社会保险号码 (AMKA) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5418">Greece Social Security Number (AMKA)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5419">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5419">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5420">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5420">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5421">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5421">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5422">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5422">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5423">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5423">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5424">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5424">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5425">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5425">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5426">无空格和分隔符的 11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5426">Eleven digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5427">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5427">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5428">6 个数字作为出生日期 YYMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5428">6 digits as date of birth YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5429">4 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5429">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5430">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5430">a check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5431">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5431">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5432">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5432">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5433">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5433">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5434">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5434">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5435">函数  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5435">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5436">找到 的  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5436">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5437">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5437">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5438">函数  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5438">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Greece Social Security Number (AMKA) -->
      <Entity id="e39b03f4-50ea-41ae-af7a-a4b9539596ad" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5439">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5439">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5440">Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5440">Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5441">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5441">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5442">ssn#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5442">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5443">social security no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5443">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5444">socialsecurityno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5444">socialsecurityno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5445">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5445">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5446">amka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5446">amka</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5447">a.m.k.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5447">a.m.k.a.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5448">Αριθμού Μητρώου Κοινωνικής Ασφάλισης</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5448">Αριθμού Μητρώου Κοινωνικής Ασφάλισης</span></span>


## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5449">希腊税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5449">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5450">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5450">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5451">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5451">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5452">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5452">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5453">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5453">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5454">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5454">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5455">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5455">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5456">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5456">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5457">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5457">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5458">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5458">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5459">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5459">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5460">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5460">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5461">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5461">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5462">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5462">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5463">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5463">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5464">正则表达式查找  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5464">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5465">找到 的  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5465">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5494">Hk Kong identity card (HKID) number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5494">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5495">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5495">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5496">8-9 个字母和数字组合，最后一个字符两边可选择加括号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5496">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5497">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5497">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5498">8-9 个字母组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5498">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5499">1-2 个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5499">1-2 letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5500">六个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5500">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5501">最后一个字符（任意数字或字母 A）是校验位，两边可以选择加括号。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5501">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5502">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5502">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5503">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5503">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5504">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5504">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5505">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5505">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5506">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5506">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5507">找到 Keyword_hong_kong_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5507">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5508">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5508">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5509">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5509">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5510">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5510">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5511">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5511">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5551">匈牙利驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5551">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5552">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5552">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5553">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5553">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5554">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5554">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5555">两个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5555">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5556">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5556">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5557">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5557">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5558">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5558">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5559">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5559">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5560">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5560">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5561">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5561">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5562">正则表达式查找  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5562">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5563">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5563">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <Entity id="9d31c46b-6e6b-444c-aeb1-6dd7e604bb24" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
