## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5688">匈牙利个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5688">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5689">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5689">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5690">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5690">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5691">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5691">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5692">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5692">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5693">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5693">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5694">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5694">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5695">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5695">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5696">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5696">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5697">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5697">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5698">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5698">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5699">1 个数字对应于性别 (1-男性、2-男性，对于在 1900 之前年龄的男性或具有双重公民关系) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5699">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5700">六个数字，对应于出生日期 (YYMMDD) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5700">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5701">对应于序列号的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5701">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5702">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5702">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5703">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5703">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5704">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5704">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5705">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5705">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5706">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5706">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5707">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5707">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5708">找到 的  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5708">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5709">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5709">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5710">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5710">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5711">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5711">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5712">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5712">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5713">id number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5713">id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5714">identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5714">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5715">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5715">sz ig</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5716">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5716">sz.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5717">ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5717">ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5718">sz.ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5718">sz.ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5719">személyazonosító igazolv一y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5719">személyazonosító igazolvány</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5720">személyi igazolvméy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5720">személyi igazolvány</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5721">匈牙利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5721">Hungary passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5722">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5722">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5723">两个字母后跟 6 个或 7 个数字，没有空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5723">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5724">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5724">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5725">两个字母后跟六个或七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5725">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5726">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5726">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5727">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5727">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5728">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5728">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5729">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5729">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5730">正则表达式查找  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5730">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5731">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5731">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5732">正则表达式查找 `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY 格式的日期 (示例 - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) 找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5732">The regular expression `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YY (Example - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5733">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5733">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5734">正则表达式查找  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5734">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5735">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5735">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5b483910-9aa7-4c99-9917-f4001464bda7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5749">útlevél száma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5749">útlevél száma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5750">Útlevelek száma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5750">Útlevelek száma</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-taj"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5755">匈牙利社会保险号码 (TAJ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5755">Hungary social security number (TAJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5756">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5756">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5757">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5757">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5758">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5758">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5759">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5759">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5760">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5760">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5761">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5761">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5762">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5762">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5763">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5763">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5764">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5764">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5765">找到 的  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5765">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5766">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5766">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5767">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5767">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Social Security Number (TAJ) -->
      <Entity id="0de78315-9537-47f5-95ab-b3e77eba3993" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5768">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5768">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5769">Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5769">Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5770">匈牙利社会安全号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5770">hungarian social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5771">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5771">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5772">socialsecuritynumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5772">socialsecuritynumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5773">hssn#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5773">hssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5774">socialsecuritynno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5774">socialsecuritynno</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5782">kázósségi adószám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5782">közösségi adószám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5783">által一os forgalmi adó szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5783">általános forgalmi adó szám</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5787">匈牙利税收标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5787">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5788">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5788">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5789">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5789">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5790">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5790">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5791">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5791">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5792">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5792">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5793">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5793">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5794">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5794">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5795">10 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5795">10 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5796">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5796">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5797">10 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5797">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5798">一个数字必须为"8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5798">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5799">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5799">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5800">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5800">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5801">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5801">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5802">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5802">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5803">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5803">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5804">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5804">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5805">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5805">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5806">找到 的  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5806">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5807">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5807">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5808">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5808">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5812">adóhatóság szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5812">adóhatóság szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5813">adószám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5813">adószám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5814">匈牙利语（该文）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5814">hungarian tin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5818">tax identification no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5818">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5819">tax identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5819">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5820">tax no#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5820">tax no#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5822">tax number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5822">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5823">tax registration number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5823">tax registration number</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5834">匈牙利增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5834">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5835">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5835">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5836">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5836">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5837">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5837">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5838">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5838">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5839">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5839">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5840">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5840">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5841">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5841">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5842">10 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5842">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5843">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5843">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5844">10 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5844">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5845">两个字母 - HU 或 hu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5845">two letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5846">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5846">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5847">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5847">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5848">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5848">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5849">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5849">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5850">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5850">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5851">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5851">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5852">函数Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5852">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5853">找到来自Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5853">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5854">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5854">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5855">函数Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5855">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5856">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5856">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_hungary_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5857">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5857">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5858">vat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5858">vat</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5860">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5860">vat#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5862">hungarianvatno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5862">hungarianvatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5863">tax no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5863">tax no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5864">value added tax áfa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5864">value added tax áfa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5865">kázósségi adószám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5865">közösségi adószám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5866">által一os forgalmi adó szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5866">általános forgalmi adó szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5867">hozzáadott一ték adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5867">hozzáadottérték adó</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5868">áfa szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5868">áfa szám</span></span>


## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5869">PAN (印度永久) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5869">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5870">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5870">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5871">10 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5871">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5872">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5872">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5873">10 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5873">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5874">三个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5874">Three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5875">C、P、H、F、A、T、B、L、J、G (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5875">A letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5876">一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5876">A letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5877">四位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5877">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5878">字母是字母检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5878">A letter that is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5879">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5879">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5880">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5880">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5881">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5881">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5882">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5882">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5883">正则表达式 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5883">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5884">找到 Keyword_india_permanent_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5884">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5885">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5885">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5886">正则表达式 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5886">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
      <Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3520.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5887">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5887">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5888">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5888">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5889">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5889">Permanent Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5890">PAN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5890">PAN</span></span> 
   
## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5891">印度唯一 (Aadhaar) 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5891">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5892">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5892">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5893">12 个数字（包含可选空格或短划线）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5893">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5894">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5894">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5895">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5895">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5896">不为 0 或 1 的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5896">A digit which is not 0 or 1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5897">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5897">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5898">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5898">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5899">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5899">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5900">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5900">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5901">最后一个数字，即检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5901">The final digit, which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5902">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5902">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5903">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5903">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5904">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5904">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5905">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5905">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5906">函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5906">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5907">找到 Keyword_india_aadhar 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5907">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5908">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5908">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5909">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5909">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5910">函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5910">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5911">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5911">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5912">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5912">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5913">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5913">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5914">aadhaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5914">aadhaar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5915">aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5915">aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5916">aadhar#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5916">aadhar#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5917">uid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5917">uid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5918">आधार</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5918">आधार</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5919">uidai</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5919">uidai</span></span>
   
## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5920">印度尼西亚身份证号码 (KTP) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5920">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5921">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5921">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5922">16 个数字（包含可选点）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5922">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5923">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5923">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5924">16 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5924">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5925">两位省代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5925">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5926">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5926">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5927">两位摄政统治区或城市代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5927">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5928">两位住宅小区代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5928">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5929">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5929">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5930">六个数字，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5930">Six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5931">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5931">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5932">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5932">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5933">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5933">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5934">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5934">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5935">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5935">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5936">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5936">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5937">正则表达式 Regex_indonesia_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5937">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5938">找到 Keyword_indonesia_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5938">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5939">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5939">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5940">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5940">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5941">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5941">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5942">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5942">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5943">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5943">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5944">国际银行帐号 (IBAN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5944">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5945">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5945">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5946">国家/地区代码（两个字母）加校验位（两个数字）以及 bban 号码（最多 30 个字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5946">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5947">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5947">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5948">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5948">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5949">两个字母的国家/地区代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5949">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5950">两个校验位（后跟一个可选空间） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5950">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5951">1-7 个包含 4 个字母或数字的组（可以使用空格进行分隔）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5951">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5952">1-3 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5952">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-p137">每个国家/地区的格式稍有不同。IBAN 敏感信息类型涵盖这 60 个国家/地区：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-p137">The format for each country is slightly different. The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5955">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5955">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5956">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5956">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5957">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5957">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5958">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5958">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5959">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5959">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5960">函数 Func_iban 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5960">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5961">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5961">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5962">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5962">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5963">无</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5963">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5964">ICD-10-CM (国际) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5964">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5965">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5965">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5966">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5966">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5967">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5967">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5968">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5968">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5969">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5969">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5970">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5970">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5971">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5971">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5972">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5972">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5973">找到来自Dictionary_icd_10_updated关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5973">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5974">找到来自Dictionary_icd_10_codes关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5974">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5975">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5975">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5976">找到更新Dictionary_icd_10_关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5976">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5977">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5977">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5978">基于国际Dictionary_icd_10_updated分类、第十次修订、修订修改 ([ICD-10-CM ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)) 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5978">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5979">此类型仅查找术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5979">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5980">基于国际Dictionary_icd_10_codes分类、第十次修订、修订修改 ([ICD-10-CM ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)) 关键字词典的任何术语。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5980">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5981">此类型仅查找保险代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5981">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5982">ICD-9-CM (国际) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5982">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5983">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5983">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5984">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5984">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5985">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5985">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5986">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5986">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5987">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5987">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5988">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5988">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5989">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5989">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5990">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5990">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5991">找到来自Dictionary_icd_9_updated关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5991">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5992">找到来自Dictionary_icd_9_codes关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5992">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5993">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5993">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5994">找到来自Dictionary_icd_9_updated关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5994">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5995">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5995">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5996">基于国际Dictionary_icd_9_updated分类、第九次修订、修订修改和 [ICD-9-CM ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605) (关键字词典) 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5996">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5997">此类型仅查找术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5997">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5998">基于国际Dictionary_icd_9_codes分类、第九次修订、修订和 [ICD-9-CM ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605) (的关键字词典中的) 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5998">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-5999">此类型仅查找保险代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-5999">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6000">IP 地址</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6000">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6001">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6001">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6002">IPv4：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6002">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6003">处理 IPv4 地址 (格式) 和无格式 (IPv4) 句点的复杂模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6003">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6004">IPv6：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6004">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6005">包含带格式的 IPv6 号码的复杂 (包括冒号) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6005">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6006">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6006">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6007">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6007">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6008">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6008">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6009">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6009">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6010">对于 IPv6，如果在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6010">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6011">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6011">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6012">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6012">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6013">对于 IPv4，如果在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6013">For IPv4, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6014">正则表达式 Regex_ipv4_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6014">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6015">找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6015">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6016">对于 IPv6，如果在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6016">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6017">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6017">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6018">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6018">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6019">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6019">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6020">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6020">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6021">此 (的 IP 关键字区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6021">IP (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6022">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6022">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6023">ip addresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6023">ip addresses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6024">internet protocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6024">internet protocol</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6025">IP-כתובת ה</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6025">IP-כתובת ה</span></span> 

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6026">爱尔兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6026">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6027">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6027">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6028">六个数字后跟四个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6028">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6029">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6029">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6030">六个数字和四个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6030">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6031">六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6031">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6032">四个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6032">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6033">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6033">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6034">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6034">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6035">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6035">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6036">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6036">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6037">正则表达式查找  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6037">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6038">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6038">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="e01bccd9-eb4d-414f-ace1-e9b6a4c4a2ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6160">ceadúnas tiom在a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6160">ceadúnas tiomána</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6161">ceadúnais tiom一a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6161">ceadúnais tiomána</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6162">爱尔兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6162">Ireland passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6163">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6163">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6164">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6164">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6165">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6165">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6166">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6166">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6167">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6167">Two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6168">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6168">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6169">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6169">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6170">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6170">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6171">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6171">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6172">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6172">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6173">正则表达式查找  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6173">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6174">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6174">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6175">正则表达式查找格式为 `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YYYYY (Example - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) 或找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字的日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6175">The regular expression `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6176">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6176">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6177">正则表达式查找  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6177">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6178">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6178">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="a2130f27-9ee2-4103-84f9-a6b1ee7d0cbf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6202">爱尔兰个人公共服务 (PPS) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6202">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6203">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6203">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6204">2012 (2012 年 12 月 31) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6204">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6205">七个数字后跟 1-2 个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6205">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6206">2013 (1 月 1 日及之后的新) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6206">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6207">七个数字后跟两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6207">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6208">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6208">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6209">2012 (2012 年 12 月 31) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6209">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6210">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6210">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6211">一到两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6211">one to two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6212">2013 (1 月 1 日及之后的新) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6212">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6213">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6213">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6214">字母 (不区分大小写) 字母检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6214">a letter (not case-sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6215">A-I 或"W"范围中的可选字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6215">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6216">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6216">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6217">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6217">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6218">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6218">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6219">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6219">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6220">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6220">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6221">找到来自Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6221">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6222">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6222">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6223">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6223">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6224">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6224">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6225">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6225">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6270">以色列银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6270">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6271">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6271">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6272">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6272">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6273">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6273">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6274">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6274">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6275">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6275">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6276">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6276">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6277">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6277">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6278">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6278">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6279">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6279">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6280">无格式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6280">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6281">	13 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6281">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6282">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6282">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6283">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6283">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6284">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6284">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6285">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6285">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6286">正则表达式 Regex_israel_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6286">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6287">找到 Keyword_israel_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6287">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6288">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6288">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6289">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6289">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6290">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6290">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6291">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6291">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6292">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6292">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6293">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6293">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6294">以色列国家标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6294">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6295">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6295">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6296">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6296">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6297">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6297">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6298">九个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6298">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6299">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6299">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6300">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6300">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6301">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6301">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6302">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6302">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6303">函数 Func_israeli_national_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6303">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6304">找到 Keyword_Israel_National_ID 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6304">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6305">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6305">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
