## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6324">意大利驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6324">Italy driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6325">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驾驶证号码敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6325">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6326">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6326">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6327">10 个字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6327">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6328">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6328">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6329">10 个字母和数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6329">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6330">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6330">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6331">字母"A"或"V" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6331">the letter "A" or "V" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6332">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6332">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6333">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6333">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6334">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6334">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6335">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6335">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6336">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6336">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6337">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6337">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6338">正则表达式查找 `Regex_italy_drivers_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6338">The regular expression `Regex_italy_drivers_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6339">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6339">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
    <Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6466">意大利财政代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6466">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6467">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6467">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6468">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6468">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6469">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6469">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6470">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6470">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6471">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6471">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6472">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6472">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6473">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6473">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6474">指定模式中字母和数字的 16 个字符组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6474">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6475">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6475">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6476">字母和数字的 16 个字符组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6476">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6477">三个字母，对应于系列名称中的前三个辅音</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6477">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6478">三个字母，分别对应名字中的第一个、第三个和第四个辅音</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6478">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6479">两个数字，对应于出生日期的最后一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6479">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6480">一个对应于出生日期月份字母的字母 - 字母按字母顺序使用，但只有字母 A 到 E、H、L、M、P、R 到 T (因此，January 为 A，10 月为 R) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6480">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (so, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6481">与出生日期对应的两个数字-为了区分性别，将 40 位添加到女士的出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6481">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6482">四个数字，对应于特定的地区代码，该人的 (国家/地区代码用于国家/地区) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6482">four digits that correspond to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6483">一个奇偶校验数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6483">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6484">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6484">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6485">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6485">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6486">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6486">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6487">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6487">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6488">函数  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6488">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6489">找到 的  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6489">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6490">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6490">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6491">函数  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6491">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6526">意大利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6526">Italy passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6527">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6527">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6528">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字（没有空格或分隔符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6528">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6529">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6529">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6530">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6530">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6531">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6531">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6532">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6532">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6533">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6533">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6534">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6534">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6535">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6535">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6536">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6536">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6537">正则表达式查找  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6537">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6538">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6538">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6539">正则表达式查找格式为 `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YYYYY (示例 - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) 或找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6539">The regular expression `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6540">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6540">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6541">正则表达式查找  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6541">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6542">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6542">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="39811019-4750-445f-b26d-4c0e6c431544" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6566">意大利增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6566">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6567">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6567">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6568">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6568">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6569">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6569">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6570">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6570">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6571">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6571">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6572">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6572">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6573">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6573">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6574">带可选分隔符的 13 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6574">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6575">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6575">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6576">带可选分隔符的 13 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6576">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6577">I 或 i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6577">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6578">T 或 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6578">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6579">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6579">optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6580">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6580">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6581">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6581">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6582">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6582">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6583">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6583">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6584">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6584">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6585">函数Func_italy_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6585">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6586">找到来自Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6586">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6587">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6587">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6588">函数Func_italy_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6588">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6590">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6590">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6596">日本银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6596">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6597">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6597">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6598">七个或八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6598">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6599">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6599">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6600">bank account number：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6600">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6601">七个或八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6601">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6602">bank account branch code：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6602">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6603">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6603">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6604">一个空格或 (划线) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6604">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6605">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6605">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6606">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6606">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6607">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6607">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6608">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6608">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6609">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6609">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6610">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6610">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6611">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6611">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6612">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6612">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6613">函数 Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6613">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6614">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6614">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6615">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6615">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6616">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6616">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6617">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6617">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6664">日本驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6664">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6665">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6665">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6666">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6666">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6667">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6667">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6668">12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6668">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6669">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6669">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6670">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6670">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6671">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6671">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6672">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6672">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6673">函数 Func_jp_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6673">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6674">找到 Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6674">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6712">日本我的号码 - 公司</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6712">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6713">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6713">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6714">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6714">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6715">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6715">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6716">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6716">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6717">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6717">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6718">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6718">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6719">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6719">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6720">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6720">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6721">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6721">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6722">13 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6722">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6723">一个数字，从 1 到 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6723">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6724">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6724">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6725">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6725">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6726">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6726">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6727">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6727">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6728">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6728">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6729">函数Func_japanese_my_number_corporate查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6729">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6730">找到来自Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6730">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6731">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6731">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6732">函数Func_japanese_my_number_corporate查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6732">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_japan_my_number_corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6734">Keyword_japan_my_number_corporate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6734">Keyword_japan_my_number_corporate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6739">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6739">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6740">個人番号カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6740">個人番号カード</span></span>

## <a name="japan-my-number---personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6745">日本我的号码 - 个人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6745">Japan My Number - Personal</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6746">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6746">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6747">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6747">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6748">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6748">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6749">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6749">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6750">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6750">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6751">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6751">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6752">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6752">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6753">12 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6753">12-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6754">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6754">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6755">12 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6755">12-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6756">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6756">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6757">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6757">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6758">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6758">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6759">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6759">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6760">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6760">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6761">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6761">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6762">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6762">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6763">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6763">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6764">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6764">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6765">函数Func_japanese_my_number_personal查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6765">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6766">找到来自Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6766">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6767">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6767">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6768">函数Func_japanese_my_number_personal查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6768">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6769">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6769">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_japan_my_number_personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6770">Keyword_japan_my_number_personal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6770">Keyword_japan_my_number_personal</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6771">my number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6771">my number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6772">マイナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6772">マイナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6773">個人番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6773">個人番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6774">共通番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6774">共通番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6775">マイナンバーカード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6775">マイナンバーカード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6776">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6776">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6777">個人番号カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6777">個人番号カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6778">個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6778">個人識別番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6779">個人識別ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6779">個人識別ナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6780">通知カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6780">通知カード</span></span>

   
## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6781">日本护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6781">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6782">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6782">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6783">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6783">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6784">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6784">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6785">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6785">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6786">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6786">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6787">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6787">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6788">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6788">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6789">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6789">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6790">函数 Func_jp_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6790">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6791">找到 Keyword_jp_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6791">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6792">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6792">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6793">Keyword_jp_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6793">Keyword_jp_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6794">Passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6794">Passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6795">Passport Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6795">Passport Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6796">Passport No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6796">Passport No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6797">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6797">Passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6798">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6798">パスポート</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6799">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6799">パスポート番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6800">パスポートナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6800">パスポートナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6801">パスポート＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6801">パスポート＃</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6802">パスポート#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6802">パスポート#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6803">パスポパスポパスポ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6803">パスポートNo.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6804">旅券番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6804">旅券番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6805">旅券番号＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6805">旅券番号＃</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6806">旅券番号♯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6806">旅券番号♯</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6807">旅券ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6807">旅券ナンバー</span></span>


## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6808">日本居民身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6808">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6809">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6809">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6810">12 个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6810">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6811">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6811">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6812">12 个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6812">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6813">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6813">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6814">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6814">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6815">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6815">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6816">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6816">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6817">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6817">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6818">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6818">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6819">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6819">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6820">正则表达式Regex_jp_residence_card_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6820">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6821">找到来自Keyword_jp_residence_card_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6821">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6822">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6822">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6823">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6823">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6824">居住地卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6824">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6825">居住卡否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6825">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6826">居住卡#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6826">Residence card #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6827">在留カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6827">在留カード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6828">在留カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6828">在留カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6829">在留番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6829">在留番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6830">日本居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6830">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6831">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6831">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6832">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6832">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6833">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6833">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6834">11 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6834">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6835">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6835">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6836">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6836">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6837">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6837">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6838">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6838">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6839">函数 Func_jp_resident_registration_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6839">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6840">找到 Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6840">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6841">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6841">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_resident_registration_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6842">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6842">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6843">Resident Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6843">Resident Registration Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6844">Residents Basic Registry Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6844">Residents Basic Registry Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6845">Resident Registration No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6845">Resident Registration No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6846">Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6846">Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6847">Residents Basic Registry No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6847">Residents Basic Registry No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6848">Basic Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6848">Basic Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6849">外国人登録証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6849">外国人登録証明書番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6850">証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6850">証明書番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6851">登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6851">登録番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6852">外国人登録証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6852">外国人登録証</span></span>

   
## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6853">日本社会保险号码 (SIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6853">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6854">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6854">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6855">7-12 个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6855">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6856">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6856">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6857">7-12 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6857">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6858">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6858">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6859">连字符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6859">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6860">六个数字 OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6860">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6861">7-12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6861">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6862">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6862">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6863">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6863">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6864">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6864">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6865">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6865">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6866">函数 Func_jp_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6866">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6867">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6867">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6868">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6868">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6869">函数 Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6869">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6870">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6870">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6891">拉脱维亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6891">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6892">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6892">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6893">三个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6893">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6894">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6894">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6895">三个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6895">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6896">三个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6896">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6897">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6897">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6898">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6898">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6899">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6899">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6900">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6900">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6901">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6901">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6902">正则表达式查找  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6902">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-6903">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-6903">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7028">拉脱维亚个人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7028">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7029">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7029">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7030">11 个数字和一个可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7030">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7031">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7031">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7032">旧格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7032">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7033">11 个数字和连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7033">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7034">六个数字，对应于 DDMMYY (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7034">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7035">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7035">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7036">一个数字，对应于 19 世纪 ("0"、20 世纪对应"1"和"21 世纪") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7036">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7037">四个数字，随机生成</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7037">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7038">新格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7038">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7039">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7039">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7040">两个数字"32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7040">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7041">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7041">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7042">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7042">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7043">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7043">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7044">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7044">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7045">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7045">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7046">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 或正则表达式 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7046">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7047">找到 的  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7047">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7048">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7048">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7049">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 或正则表达式 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7049">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7112">拉脱维亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7112">Latvia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7113">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7113">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7114">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字（没有空格或分隔符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7114">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7115">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7115">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7116">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7116">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7117">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7117">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7118">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7118">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7119">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7119">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7120">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7120">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7121">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7121">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7122">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7122">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7123">正则表达式查找  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7123">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7124">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7124">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7125">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7125">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7126">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7126">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7127">正则表达式查找  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7127">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7128">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7128">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="23ae25ec-cc28-421b-b77a-3054eadf1ede" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7151">立陶宛驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7151">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7152">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7152">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7153">八个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7153">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7154">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7154">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7155">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7155">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7156">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7156">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7157">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7157">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7158">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7158">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7159">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7159">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7160">正则表达式查找  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7160">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7161">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7161">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7286">立陶宛个人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7286">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7287">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7287">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7288">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7288">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7289">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7289">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7290">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7290">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7291">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7291">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7292">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7292">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7293">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7293">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7294">11 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7294">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7295">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7295">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7296">11 个数字，不带空格和分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7296">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7297">一个数字 (1-6) 对应于性别和出生日期的世纪</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7297">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7298">六个数字，对应于出生日期 (YYMMDD) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7298">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7299">三个数字，对应于出生日期的序列号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7299">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7300">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7300">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7301">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7301">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7302">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7302">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7303">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7303">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7304">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7304">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7305">函数  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7305">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7306">找到 的  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7306">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7307">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7307">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7308">函数  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7308">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7343">立陶宛护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7343">Lithuania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7344">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7344">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7345">八个数字或字母，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7345">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7346">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7346">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7347">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7347">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7348">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7348">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7349">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7349">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7350">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7350">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7351">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7351">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7352">正则表达式查找  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7352">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7353">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7353">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7354">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` 格式为 DD MM YYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7354">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7355">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7355">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7356">正则表达式查找  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7356">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7357">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7357">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1b79900f-047b-4c3f-846f-7d73b5534bce" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7377">百度达驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7377">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7378">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7378">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7379">6 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7379">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7380">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7380">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7381">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7381">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7382">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7382">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7383">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7383">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7384">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7384">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7385">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7385">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7386">正则表达式查找  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7386">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7387">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7387">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
