## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7511"> (的自然人的) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7511">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7512">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7512">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7513">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7513">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7514">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7514">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7515">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7515">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7516">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7516">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7517">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7517">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7518">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7518">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7519">13 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7519">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7520">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7520">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7521">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7521">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7522">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7522">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7523">两个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7523">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7524">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7524">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7525">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7525">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7526">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7526">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7527">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7527">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7528">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7528">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7529">找到 的  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7529">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7530">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7530">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7531">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7531">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7554">百里达护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7554">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7555">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7555">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7556">八个数字或字母，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7556">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7557">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7557">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7558">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7558">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7559">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7559">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7560">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7560">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7561">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7561">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7562">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7562">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7563">正则表达式查找  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7563">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7564">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7564">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7565">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` 格式为 DD MM YYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7565">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7566">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7566">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7567">正则表达式查找  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7567">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7568">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7568">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="81d5c027-bed9-4421-91a0-3b2e55b3eb85" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7600">阿比塞卡 (非自然人的身份证号) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7600">Luxemburg national identification number (non-natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7601">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7601">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7602">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7602">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7603">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7603">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7604">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7604">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7605">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7605">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7606">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7606">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7607">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7607">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7608">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7608">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7609">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7609">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7610">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7610">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7611">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7611">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7612">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7612">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7613">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7613">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7614">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7614">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7615">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7615">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7616">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7616">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7617">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7617">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7618">找到 的  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7618">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7619">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7619">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7620">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7620">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7660">马来西亚身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7660">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7661">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7661">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7662">12 个数字（包含可选连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7662">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7663">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7663">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7664">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7664">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7665">六个数字，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7665">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7666">划线 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7666">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7667">双字母的出生日期位置代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7667">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7668">划线 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7668">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7669">三个随机数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7669">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7670">一位数性别代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7670">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7671">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7671">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7672">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7672">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7673">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7673">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7674">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7674">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7675">正则表达式 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7675">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7676">找到 Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7676">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7703">马耳他驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7703">Malta driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7704">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7704">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7705">指定模式中两个字符和六个数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7705">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7706">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7706">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7707">两个字符和六个数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7707">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7708">两个字符 (数字或字母，不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7708">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7709">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7709">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7710">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7710">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7711">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7711">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7712">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7712">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7713">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7713">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7714">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7714">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7715">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7715">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7716">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7716">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7717">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7717">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7718">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7718">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7842">马耳他身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7842">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7843">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7843">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7844">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7844">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7845">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7845">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7846">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7846">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7847">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7847">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7848">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7848">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7849">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7849">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7850">七个数字后跟一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7850">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7851">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7851">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7852">七个数字后跟一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7852">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7853">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7853">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7854">"M、G、A、P、L、H、B、Z"中的一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7854">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7855">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7855">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7856">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7856">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7857">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7857">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7858">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7858">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7859">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7859">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7860">找到 的  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7860">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7861">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7861">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7862">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7862">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7864">Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7864">Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7867">identifjet numru tal-jett</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7867">identifika numru tal-biljett</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7868">kodiċi数字 personali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7868">kodiċi numerali personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7869">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni personali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7869">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7870">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7870">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7871">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7871">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7872">numru ta' identità uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7872">numru ta' identità uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7873">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7873">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7874">numru tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7874">numru tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7875">个人数字代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7875">personal numeric code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7876">唯一标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7876">unique identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7877">唯一标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7877">unique identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7878">uniqueidentityno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7878">uniqueidentityno#</span></span>


## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7879">马耳他护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7879">Malta passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7880">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7880">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7881">七个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7881">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7882">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7882">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7883">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7883">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7884">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7884">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7885">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7885">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7886">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7886">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7887">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7887">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7888">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7888">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7889">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7889">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7890">找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字来自</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7890">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7891">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7891">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7892">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7892">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7893">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7893">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="b2b21198-48f9-4d13-b2a5-03969bff0fb8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7894">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7894">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7895">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7895">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7896">passport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7896">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7897">passport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7897">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7898">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7898">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7899">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7899">passports</span></span>

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7913">马耳他税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7913">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7914">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7914">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7915">对于马耳他语：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7915">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7916">指定模式中的七个数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7916">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7917">非马耳他语公民和马耳他语实体：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7917">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7918">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7918">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7919">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7919">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7920">马耳他语：七个数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7920">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7921">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7921">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7922">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7922">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7923">非马耳他公民和马耳他实体：9 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7923">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7924">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7924">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7925">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7925">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7926">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7926">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7927">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7927">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7928">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7928">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7929">正则表达式或  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7929">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7930">找到 的  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7930">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7931">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7931">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7932">正则表达式或  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7932">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="medicare-beneficiary-identifier-mbi-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7965">一个 MBI (的) 标识符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7965">Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7966">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7966">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7967">十二字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7967">eleven character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7968">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7968">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7969">1 到 9 之间的一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7969">one digit between 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7970">一个字母，不包括 S、L、O、I、B、Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7970">one letter excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7971">一个数字或字母，不包括 S、L、O、I、B、Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7971">one digit or letter excluding S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7972">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7972">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7973">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7973">an optional Hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7974">一个字母，不包括 S、L、O、I、B、Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7974">one letter excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7975">一个数字或字母，不包括 S、L、O、I、B、Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7975">one digit or letter excluding S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7976">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7976">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7977">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7977">an optional Hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7978">两个字母，不包括 S、L、O、I、B、Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7978">two letters excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7979">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7979">two digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7980">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7980">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7981">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7981">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7982">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7982">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7983">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7983">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7984">正则表达式查找  `Regex_mbi_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7984">The regular expression  `Regex_mbi_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7985">找到 的  `Keyword_mbi_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7985">A keyword from  `Keyword_mbi_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7986">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7986">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7987">正则表达式查找  `Regex_mbi_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7987">The regular expression  `Regex_mbi_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
    <!-- Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) card -->
      <Entity id="f753a286-f5cc-47e6-a592-4be25fd02591" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_mbi_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_mbi_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_mbi_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7988">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7988">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_mbi_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7989">Keyword_mbi_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7989">Keyword_mbi_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7990">mbi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7990">mbi</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7991">mbi#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7991">mbi#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7992">一名收入#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7992">medicare beneficiary #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7993">一个优势标识符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7993">medicare beneficiary identifier</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7994">一名受益者否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7994">medicare beneficiary no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7995">一名收入者编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7995">medicare beneficiary number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7996">一名收入#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7996">medicare beneficiary#</span></span>


## <a name="mexico-unique-population-registry-code-curp"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7997">墨西哥唯一总体注册表代码 (CURP) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7997">Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7998">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7998">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-7999">18 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-7999">18 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8000">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8000">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8001">四个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8001">four letters (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8002">六个数字，表示有效日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8002">six digits indicating a valid date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8003">字母 - H/h 或 M/m</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8003">a letter - H/h or M/m</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8004">指示有效"墨西哥"状态代码的两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8004">two letters indicating a valid Mexican state code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8005">三个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8005">three letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8006">一个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8006">one letter or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8007">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8007">one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8008">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8008">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8009">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8009">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8010">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8010">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8011">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8011">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8012">函数  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8012">The function  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8013">找到 的  `Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8013">A keyword from  `Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8014">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8014">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8015">函数  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8015">The function  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
    <!-- Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP) -->
      <Entity id="e905ad4d-5a74-406d-bf36-b1efca798af4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_mexico_population_registry_code" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_mexico_population_registry_code" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8021">唯一总体代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8021">unique population code</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8036">荷兰公民服务号码 (BSN) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8036">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8037">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8037">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8038">包含可选空格的八个或九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8038">eight or nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8039">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8039">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8040">八个九个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8040">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8041">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8041">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8042">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8042">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8043">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8043">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8044">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8044">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8045">2-3 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8045">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8046">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8046">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8047">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8047">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8048">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8048">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8049">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8049">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8050">函数 Func_netherlands_bsn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8050">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8051">找到 Keyword_netherlands_bsn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8051">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8052">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8052">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8076">荷兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8076">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8077">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8077">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8078">10 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8078">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8079">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8079">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8080">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8080">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8081">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8081">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8082">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8082">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8083">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8083">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8084">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8084">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8085">正则表达式查找  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8085">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8086">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8086">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8214">荷兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8214">Netherlands passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8215">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8215">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8216">九个字母或数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8216">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8217">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8217">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8218">九个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8218">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8219">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8219">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8220">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8220">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8221">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8221">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8222">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8222">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8223">正则表达式查找  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8223">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8224">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8224">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8225">正则表达式查找格式 `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` 为 DD MMM/MMM YYYYY (Example - 26 MAA/MAR 2012) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8225">The regular expression `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8226">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8226">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8227">正则表达式查找  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8227">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8228">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8228">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61786727-bafd-45f6-94d9-888d815e228e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8246">荷兰税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8246">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8247">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8247">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8248">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8248">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8249">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8249">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8250">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8250">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8251">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8251">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8252">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8252">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8253">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8253">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8254">九个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8254">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8255">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8255">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8256">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8256">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8257">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8257">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8258">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8258">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8259">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8259">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8260">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8260">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8261">函数  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8261">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8262">找到 的  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8262">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8263">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8263">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8264">函数  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8264">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8302">荷兰增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8302">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8303">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8303">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8304">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8304">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8305">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8305">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8306">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8306">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8307">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8307">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8308">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8308">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8309">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8309">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8310">14 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8310">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8311">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8311">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8312">14 字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8312">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8313">N 或 n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8313">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8314">L 或 l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8314">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8315">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8315">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8316">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8316">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8317">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8317">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8318">B 或 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8318">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8319">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8319">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8320">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8320">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8321">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8321">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8322">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8322">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8323">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8323">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8324">函数Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8324">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8325">找到来自Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8325">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8326">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8326">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8327">函数Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8327">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8329">Keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8329">Keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8330">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8330">vat number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8332">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8332">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8333">wearde tafoege tax getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8333">wearde tafoege tax getal</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8334">btw n与mer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8334">btw nûmer</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8336">新西兰银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8336">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8337">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8337">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8338">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8338">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8339">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8339">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8340">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8340">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8341">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8341">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8342">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8342">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8343">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8343">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8344">带可选分隔符的 14 位到 16 位模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8344">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8345">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8345">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8346">带可选分隔符的 14 位到 16 位模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8346">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8347">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8347">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8348">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8348">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8349">三到四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8349">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8350">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8350">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8351">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8351">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8352">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8352">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8353">两到三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8353">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8354">选项连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8354">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8355">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8355">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8356">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8356">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8357">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8357">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8358">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8358">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8359">函数Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8359">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8360">找到来自Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8360">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8361">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8361">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8362">函数Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8362">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zFealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8364">Keyword_new_zealand_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8364">Keyword_new_zealand_bank_account_number</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8370">新西兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8370">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8371">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8371">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8372">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8372">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8373">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8373">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8374">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8374">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8375">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8375">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8376">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8376">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8377">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8377">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8378">八个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8378">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8379">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8379">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8380">八个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8380">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8381">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8381">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8382">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8382">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8383">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8383">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8384">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8384">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8385">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8385">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8386">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8386">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8387">函数Func_newzealand_driver_license_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8387">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8388">找到来自Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8388">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8389">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8389">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8390">函数Func_newzealand_driver_license_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8390">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
