## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8457">新西兰的收入数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8457">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8458">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8458">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8459">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8459">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8460">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8460">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8461">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8461">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8462">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8462">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8463">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8463">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8464">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8464">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8465">八个或九个数字（带可选分隔符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8465">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8466">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8466">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8467">八个或九个数字（带可选分隔符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8467">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8468">两个或三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8468">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8469">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8469">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8470">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8470">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8471">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8471">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8472">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8472">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8473">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8473">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8474">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8474">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8475">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8475">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8476">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8476">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8477">函数Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8477">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8478">找到来自Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8478">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8479">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8479">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8480">函数Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8480">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8481">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8481">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8482">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8482">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8483">否。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8483">ird no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8484">ird 否#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8484">ird no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8485">nz ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8485">nz ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8486">新西兰 ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8486">new zealand ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8487">ird number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8487">ird number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8488">一元收入数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8488">inland revenue number</span></span>


## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8489">新西兰卫生服务局号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8489">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8490">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8490">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8491">三个字母，一 (可选) 和四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8491">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8492">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8492">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8493">三个字母 (区分大小写) "I"和"O"除外</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8493">three letters (not case-sensitive) except 'I' and 'O'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8494">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8494">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8495">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8495">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8496">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8496">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8497">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8497">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8498">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8498">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8499">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8499">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8500">函数 Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8500">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8501">找到 Keyword_nz_terms 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8501">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8502">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8502">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8503">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8503">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8504">函数 Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8504">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8505">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8505">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
    <Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
       </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8506">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8506">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_nz_terms"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8507">Keyword_nz_terms</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8507">Keyword_nz_terms</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8508">NHI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8508">NHI</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8509">New Zealand</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8509">New Zealand</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8510">健康</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8510">Health</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8511">处理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8511">treatment</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8512">National Health Index Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8512">National Health Index Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8513">nhi number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8513">nhi number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8514">nhi no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8514">nhi no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8515">NHI#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8515">NHI#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8516">National Health Index No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8516">National Health Index No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8517">National Health Index Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8517">National Health Index Id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8518">National Health Index#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8518">National Health Index #</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-social-welfare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8519">新西兰社会电话号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8519">New Zealand social welfare number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8520">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8520">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8521">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8521">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8522">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8522">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8523">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8523">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8524">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8524">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8525">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8525">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8526">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8526">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8527">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8527">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8528">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8528">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8529">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8529">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8530">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8530">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8531">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8531">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8532">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8532">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8533">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8533">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8534">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8534">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8535">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8535">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8536">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8536">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8537">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8537">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8538">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8538">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8539">函数Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8539">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8540">找到来自Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8540">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8541">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8541">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8542">函数Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8542">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8543">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8543">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8544">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8544">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8545">社交 <2> <2> <3>#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8545">social welfare #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8546">社交 <2> <2> <3>#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8546">social welfare#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8547">social一号。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8547">social welfare No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8548">social 时号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8548">social welfare number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8549">swn#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8549">swn#</span></span>

   
## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8550">挪威标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8550">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8551">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8551">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8552">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8552">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8553">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8553">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8554">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8554">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8555">六个数字，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8555">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8556">三位数个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8556">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8557">两个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8557">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8558">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8558">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8559">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8559">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8560">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8560">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8561">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8561">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8562">函数 Func_norway_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8562">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8563">找到 Keyword_norway_id_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8563">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8564">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8564">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8565">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8565">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8566">函数 Func_norway_id_numbe 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8566">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8567">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8567">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8576">菲律宾统一的多用途标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8576">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8577">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8577">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8578">12 个数字，通过连字符分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8578">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8579">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8579">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8580">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8580">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8581">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8581">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8582">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8582">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8583">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8583">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8584">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8584">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8585">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8585">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8586">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8586">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8587">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8587">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8588">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8588">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8589">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8589">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8590">正则表达式 Regex_philippines_unified_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8590">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8591">找到 Keyword_philippines_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8591">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8592">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8592">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8594">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8594">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8595">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8595">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8596">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8596">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8597">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8597">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8598">波兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8598">Poland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8599">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8599">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8600">14 个数字，包含两个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8600">14 digits containing two forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8601">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8601">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8602">14 个数字和两个正斜杠：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8602">14 digits and two forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8603">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8603">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8604">正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8604">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8605">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8605">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8606">正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8606">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8607">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8607">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8608">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8608">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8609">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8609">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8610">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8610">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8611">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8611">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8612">正则表达式查找  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8612">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8613">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8613">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8737">波兰身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8737">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8738">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8738">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8739">三个字母和六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8739">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8740">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8740">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8741">三个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8741">three letters (not case-sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8742">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8742">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8743">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8743">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8744">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8744">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8745">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8745">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8746">函数 Func_polish_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8746">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8747">找到 Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8747">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8748">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8748">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8749">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8749">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8750">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8750">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8751">）Osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8751">Dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8752">Numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8752">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8753">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8753">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8754">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8754">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8755">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8755">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8756">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8756">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-p142">dow. os.
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-p142">dow. os.</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8759">波兰国家/ (PESEL) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8759">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8760">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8760">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8761">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8761">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8762">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8762">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8763">六个数字，表示 YYMMDD 格式的出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8763">six digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8764">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8764">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8765">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8765">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8766">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8766">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8767">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8767">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8768">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8768">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8769">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8769">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8770">函数 Func_pesel_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8770">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8771">找到 Keyword_pesel_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8771">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8772">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8772">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8773">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8773">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8774">函数 Func_pesel_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8774">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8775">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8775">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8776">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8776">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_pesel_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8777">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8777">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8778">dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8778">dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8779">dowódosobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8779">dowódosobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8780">niepowtarzalny numer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8780">niepowtarzalny numer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8781">niepowtarzalnynumer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8781">niepowtarzalnynumer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8782">nr.-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8782">nr.-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8783">nr-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8783">nr-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8784">numer identyfikacyjny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8784">numer identyfikacyjny</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8785">pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8785">pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8786">tożsamości narodowej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8786">tożsamości narodowej</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8787">波兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8787">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8788">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8788">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8789">它作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8789">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8790">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8790">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8791">两个字母和七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8791">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8792">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8792">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8793">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8793">Two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8794">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8794">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8795">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8795">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8796">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8796">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8797">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8797">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8798">函数 `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8798">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8799">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8799">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8800">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8800">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8801">找到 的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8801">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8802">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8802">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8803">函数 `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8803">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8804">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8804">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8805">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8805">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8806">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8806">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8807">函数 `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8807">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8808">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8808">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8834">波兰 REGON 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8834">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8835">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8835">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8836">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8836">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8837">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8837">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8838">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8838">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8839">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8839">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8840">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8840">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8841">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8841">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8842">9 位数字或 14 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8842">9-digit or 14-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8843">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8843">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8844">九位数字或 14 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8844">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8845">九个数字或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8845">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8846">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8846">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8847">hyphen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8847">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8848">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8848">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8849">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8849">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8850">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8850">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8851">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8851">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8852">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8852">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8853">函数Func_polish_regon_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8853">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8854">找到来自Keywords_polish_regon_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8854">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8855">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8855">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8856">函数Func_polish_regon_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8856">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8862">统计否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8862">statistical no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8868">companyidno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8868">companyidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8869">numer statystyczny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8869">numer statystyczny</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8870">numeru regon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8870">numeru regon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8871">numerstatystyczny#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8871">numerstatystyczny#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8872">numeruregon#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8872">numeruregon#</span></span>


## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8873">波兰税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8873">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8874">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8874">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8875">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8875">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8876">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8876">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8877">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8877">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8878">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8878">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8879">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8879">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8880">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8880">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8881">11 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8881">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8882">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8882">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8883">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8883">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8884">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8884">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8885">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8885">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8886">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8886">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8887">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8887">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8888">函数  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8888">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8889">找到 的  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8889">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8895">numeridentyfikacjipodatkowej#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8895">numeridentyfikacjipodatkowej#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8898">tax identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8898">tax identification number</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8919">葡萄牙公民卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8919">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8920">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8920">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8921">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8921">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8922">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8922">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8923">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8923">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8924">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8924">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8925">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8925">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8926">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8926">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8927">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8927">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8928">正则表达式 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8928">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8929">找到 Keyword_portugal_citizen_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8929">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8949">葡萄牙驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8949">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8950">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8950">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8951">两个模式 - 两个字母后跟 5-8 个数字（带特殊字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8951">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8952">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8952">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8953">模式 1：两个字母后跟 5/6 特殊字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8953">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8954">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8954">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8955">一个连字符 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8955">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8956">五个或六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8956">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8957">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8957">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8958">一位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8958">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8959">模式 2：一个字母后跟 6/8 个数字（带特殊字符）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8959">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8960">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8960">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8961">一个连字符 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8961">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8962">六个或八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8962">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8963">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8963">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8964">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8964">One digit</span></span>

    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8965">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8965">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8966">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8966">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8967">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8967">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8968">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8968">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8969">正则表达式查找  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8969">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-8970">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-8970">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9102">葡萄牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9102">Portugal passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9103">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9103">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9104">一个字母后跟 6 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9104">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9105">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9105">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9106">一个字母后跟六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9106">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9107">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9107">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9108">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9108">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9109">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9109">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9110">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9110">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9111">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9111">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9112">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9112">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9113">正则表达式查找  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9113">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9114">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9114">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9115">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9115">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9116">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9116">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9117">正则表达式查找  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9117">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9118">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9118">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="080a52fd-a7bc-431e-b54d-51f08f59db11" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9146">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9146">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9147">九个数字（带可选空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9147">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9148">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9148">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9149">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9149">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9150">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9150">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9151">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9151">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9152">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9152">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9153">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9153">three digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9154">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9154">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9155">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9155">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9156">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9156">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9157">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9157">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9158">函数  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9158">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9159">找到 的  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9159">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9160">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9160">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9161">函数  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9161">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9186">罗马尼亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9186">Romania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9187">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9187">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9188">一个字符后跟八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9188">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9189">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9189">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9190">一个字符后跟八个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9190">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9191">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9191">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9192">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9192">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9193">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9193">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9194">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9194">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9195">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9195">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9196">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9196">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9197">正则表达式查找  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9197">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9198">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9198">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9326">使用 CNP (罗马尼亚个人) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9326">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9327">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9327">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9328">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9328">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9329">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9329">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9330">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9330">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9331">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9331">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9332">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9332">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9333">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9333">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9334">不带空格和分隔符的 13 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9334">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9335">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9335">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9336">一个数字，从 1 到 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9336">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9337">六个数字，表示 YYMMDD (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9337">six digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9338">两个数字，可以是 01-52 或 99</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9338">two digits, which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9339">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9339">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9340">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9340">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9341">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9341">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9342">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9342">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9343">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9343">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9344">函数  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9344">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9345">找到 的  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9345">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9346">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9346">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9347">函数  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9347">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9398">罗马尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9398">Romania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9399">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9399">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9400">八个或九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9400">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9401">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9401">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9402">八个或九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9402">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9403">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9403">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9404">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9404">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9405">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9405">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9406">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9406">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9407">正则表达式查找  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9407">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9408">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9408">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9409">正则表达式查找 `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY 格式的日期 (示例- 01 2 月/2 月 10) 或找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9409">The regular expression `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (Example- 01 FEB/FEB 10) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9410">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9410">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9411">正则表达式查找  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9411">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9412">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9412">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5d31b90c-7fe2-4a76-a14b-767b8fd19d6c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9426">numrul pașaportului numarul pasaportului numerele pașaportului Pașaport nr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9426">numărul pașaportului numarul pasaportului numerele pașaportului Pașaport nr</span></span>

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9430">俄罗斯护照号码国内</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9430">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9431">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9431">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9432">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9432">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9433">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9433">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9434">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9434">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9435">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9435">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9436">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9436">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9437">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9437">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9438">10 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9438">10-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9439">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9439">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9440">10 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9440">10-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9441">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9441">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9442">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9442">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9443">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9443">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9444">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9444">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9445">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9445">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9446">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9446">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9447">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9447">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9448">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9448">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9449">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9449">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9450">正则表达式Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9450">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9451">找到来自Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9451">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
