## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9468">俄罗斯护照号码国际</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9468">Russia passport number international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9469">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9469">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9470">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9470">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9471">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9471">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9472">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9472">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9473">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9473">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9474">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9474">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9475">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9476">九位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9476">nine-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9477">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9477">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9478">九位数：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9478">nine-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9479">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9479">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9480">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9480">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9481">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9481">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9482">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9482">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9483">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9483">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9484">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9484">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9485">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9485">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9486">正则表达式Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9486">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9487">找到来自Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9487">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9488">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9488">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_russia_passport_number_international"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9489">Keywords_russia_passport_number_international</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9489">Keywords_russia_passport_number_international</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9490">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9490">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9491">passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9491">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9492">passport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9492">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9493">passport id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9493">passport id</span></span>

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9504">沙特阿拉伯国家 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9504">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9505">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9505">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9506">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9506">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9507">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9507">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9508">10 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9508">10 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9509">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9509">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9510">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9510">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9511">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9511">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9512">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9512">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9513">正则表达式 Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9513">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9514">找到 Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9514">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9515">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9515">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9516">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9516">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9517">Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9517">Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9518">I card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9518">I card number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9519">ID number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9519">ID number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9520">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9520">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span> 

   
## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9521">新加坡国家注册身份证号码 (NRIC) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9521">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9522">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9522">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9523">九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9523">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9524">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9524">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9525">九个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9525">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9526">字母"F"、"G"、"S"或"T" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9526">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9527">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9527">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9528">字母检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9528">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9529">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9529">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9530">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9530">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9531">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9531">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9532">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9532">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9533">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9533">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9534">找到 Keyword_singapore_nric 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9534">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9535">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9535">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9536">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9536">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9537">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9537">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9538">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9538">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9549">斯洛伐克驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9549">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9550">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9550">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9551">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9551">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9552">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9552">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9553">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9553">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9554">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9554">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9555">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9555">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9556">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9556">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9557">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9557">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9558">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9558">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9559">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9559">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9560">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9560">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9561">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9561">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9687">斯洛伐克个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9687">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9688">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9688">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9689">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9689">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9690">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9690">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9691">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9691">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9692">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9692">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9693">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9693">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9694">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9694">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9695">九个或十个数字，包含可选反杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9695">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9696">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9696">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9697">六个数字，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9697">six digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9698">可选斜杠 (/) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9698">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9699">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9699">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9700">一个可选检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9700">one optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9701">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9701">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9702">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9702">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9703">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9703">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9704">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9704">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9705">函数  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9705">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9706">找到 的  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9706">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9707">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9707">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9708">函数  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9708">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9755">斯洛伐克护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9755">Slovakia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9756">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9756">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9757">一个数字或字母后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9757">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9758">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9758">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9759">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9759">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9760">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9760">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9761">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9761">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9762">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9762">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9763">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9763">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9764">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9764">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9765">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9765">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9766">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9766">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9767">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9767">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9768">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9768">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9769">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9769">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="238e1f08-d80e-4793-af33-9b57918335b7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9791">斯洛文尼亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9791">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9792">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9792">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9793">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9793">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9794">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9794">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9795">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9795">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9796">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9796">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9797">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9797">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9798">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9798">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9799">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9799">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9800">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9800">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9801">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9801">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9928">斯洛文尼亚唯一主公民编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9928">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9929">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9929">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9930">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9930">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9931">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9931">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9932">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9932">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9933">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9933">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9934">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9934">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9935">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9935">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9936">不带空格或分隔符的 13 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9936">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9937">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9937">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9938">指定模式中的 13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9938">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9939">对应于出生日期的七个数字 (DDMMLLL) 其中"LLL"对应于出生日期的最后三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9939">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9940">两个数字，对应于出生日期"50"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9940">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9941">三个数字，分别对应同一天男性的性别和序列号组合 (000-499 和 500-999（对于男性) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9941">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9942">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9942">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9943">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9943">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9944">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9944">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9945">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9945">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9946">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9946">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9947">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9947">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9948">找到 的  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9948">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9949">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9949">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9950">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9950">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9978">斯洛文尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9978">Slovenia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9979">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9979">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9980">两个字母后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9980">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9981">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9981">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9982">两个字母后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9982">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9983">字母"P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9983">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9984">一个小写字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9984">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9985">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9985">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9986">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9986">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9987">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9987">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9988">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9988">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9989">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9989">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9990">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9990">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9991">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9991">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9992">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9992">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9993">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9993">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9994">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9994">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-9995">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-9995">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="235b7976-7bbe-4df5-bb40-08678e749d1a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10006">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10006">passportnumbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10008">Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10008">Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10009">个tevilka potnega lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10009">številka potnega lista</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10010">potek veljavnosti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10010">potek veljavnosti</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10018">斯洛文尼亚税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10018">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10019">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10019">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10020">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10020">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10021">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10021">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10022">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10022">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10023">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10023">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10024">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10024">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10025">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10025">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10026">八个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10026">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10027">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10027">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10028">一个数字，从 1 到 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10028">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10029">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10029">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10030">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10030">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10031">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10031">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10032">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10032">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10033">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10033">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10034">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10034">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10035">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10035">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10036">找到 的  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10036">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10037">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10037">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10038">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10038">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10062">南非标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10062">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10063">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10063">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10064">13 个数字（可能包含空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10064">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10065">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10065">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10066">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10066">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10067">六个数字，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10067">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10068">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10068">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10069">单数字公民指示符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10069">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10070">数字"8"或"9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10070">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10071">一个数字，即校验和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10071">one digit, which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10072">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10072">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10073">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10073">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10074">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10074">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10075">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10075">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10076">函数 Func_south_africa_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10076">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10077">找到 Keyword_south_africa_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10077">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10078">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10078">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10079">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10079">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_africa_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10080">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10080">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10081">Identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10081">Identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10082">ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10082">ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10083">标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10083">Identification</span></span> 
   
## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10084">韩国居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10084">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10085">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10085">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10086">13 个数字（包含连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10086">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10087">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10087">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10088">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10088">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10089">六个数字，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10089">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10090">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10090">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10091">一个数字，由世纪和性别决定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10091">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10092">四位数的出生日期区域代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10092">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10093">一个数字，用于区分前面数字完全相同的人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10093">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10094">一个检查数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10094">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10095">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10095">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10096">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10096">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10097">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10097">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10098">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10098">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10099">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10099">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10100">找到 Keyword_south_korea_resident_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10100">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10101">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10101">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10102">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10102">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10103">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10103">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10104">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10104">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10105">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10105">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10106">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10106">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10107">National ID card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10107">National ID card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10108">Citizen's Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10108">Citizen's Registration Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10109">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10109">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10110">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10110">RRN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10111">주민등록번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10111">주민등록번호</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10112">西班牙驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10112">Spain driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10113">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10113">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10114">八个数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10114">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10115">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10115">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10116">八个数字后跟一个字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10116">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10117">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10117">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10118">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10118">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10119">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10119">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10120">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10120">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10121">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10121">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10122">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10122">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10123">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10123">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10124">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10124">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10125">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10125">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10126">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10126">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10260">西班牙 DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10260">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10261">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10261">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10262">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10262">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10263">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10263">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10264">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10264">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10265">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10265">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10266">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10266">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10267">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10267">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10268">八个数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10268">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10269">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10269">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10270">七个数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10270">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10271">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10271">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10272">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10272">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10273">一个检查 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10273">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10274">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10274">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10275">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10275">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10276">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10276">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10277">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10277">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10278">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10278">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10279">找到 的  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10279">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10280">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10280">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10281">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10281">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10305">西班牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10305">Spain passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10306">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10306">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10307">字母和数字的八字符或九字符组合，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10307">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10308">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10308">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10309">字母和数字的八字符或九字符组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10309">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10310">两个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10310">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10311">一个数字或字母 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10311">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10312">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10312">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10313">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10313">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10314">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10314">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10315">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10315">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10316">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10316">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10317">正则表达式查找  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10317">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10318">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10318">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10319">正则表达式查找 `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` DD-MM-YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10319">The regular expression `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD-MM-YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10320">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10320">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10321">正则表达式查找  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10321">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10322">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10322">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d17a57de-9fa5-4e9f-85d3-85c26d89686e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10351">西班牙社会保险号码 (SSN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10351">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10352">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10352">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10353">11-12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10353">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10354">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10354">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10355">11-12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10355">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10356">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10356">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10357">可选参数， (正斜) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10357">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10358">七到八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10358">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10359">可选参数， (正斜) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10359">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10360">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10360">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10361">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10361">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10362">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10362">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10363">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10363">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10364">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10364">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10365">函数 Func_spanish_social_security_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10365">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10366">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10366">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- - <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10367">找到 的  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10367">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10368">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10368">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10369">函数 Func_spanish_social_security_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10369">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10370">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10370">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Spain SSN -->
    <Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10371">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10371">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_spain_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10372">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10372">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10373">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10373">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10374">ssn#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10374">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10375">socialsecurityno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10375">socialsecurityno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10376">social security no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10376">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10377">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10377">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10378">número de la seguridad social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10378">número de la seguridad social</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10379">西班牙税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10379">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10380">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10380">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10381">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10381">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10382">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10382">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10383">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10383">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10384">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10384">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10385">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10385">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10386">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10386">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10387">七个或八个数字以及指定模式中的一个或两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10387">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10388">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10388">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10389">具有西班牙国家身份证的西班牙自然人：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10389">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10390">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10390">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10391">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10391">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10392">没有西班牙国家身份证的非常驻 Spaniards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10392">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10393">一个小写字母"L" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10393">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10394">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10394">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10395">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10395">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10396">没有西班牙国家身份证的 14 岁以下的儿童的常驻 Spaniards：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10396">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10397">一个小写字母"K" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10397">one uppercase letter "K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10398">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10398">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10399">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10399">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10400">具有一位用户标识号的百位用户</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10400">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10401">一个小写字母，"X"、"Y"或"Z" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10401">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10402">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10402">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10403">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10403">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10404">没有标识号的百分卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10404">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10405">一个区分大小写的大写字母 ("M") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10405">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10406">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10406">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10407">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10407">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10408">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10408">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10409">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10409">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10410">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10410">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10411">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10411">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10412">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10412">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10413">找到 的  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10413">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10414">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10414">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10415">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10415">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
