## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10446">SQL Server连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10446">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10447">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10447">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10448">字符串"用户 ID"、"用户 ID"、"uid"或"UserId"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10448">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10449">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10449">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10450">字符串"用户 ID"、"用户 ID"、"uid"或"UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10450">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10451">1-200 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10451">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10452">字符串"Password"或"pwd"，其中"pwd"的前面没有小写字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10452">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" isn't preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10453">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10453">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10454">任何不是美元符号的字符 ($) 、百分比符号 (%) 、大于符号 (>) 、符号 (@) 、引号 (") 、分号 (;) 、左大括号 ([) 或左括号 ({) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10454">any character that isn't a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10455">7-128 个字符的任意组合，这些字符不是分号 (;) 、正斜杠 (/) 或引号 (") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10455">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10456">分号 (;) 或引号 (") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10456">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10457">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10457">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10458">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10458">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10459">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10459">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10460">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10460">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10461">正则表达式CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10461">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10462">未找到CEP_GlobalFilter关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10462">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter isn't found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10463">正则表达式CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10463">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10464">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10464">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10465">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10465">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10466">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10466">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10467">some-password</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10467">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10468">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10468">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10469">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10469">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10470">示例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10470">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10471">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10471">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10472"> (请注意，从技术上说，此敏感信息类型使用正则表达式（而不是关键字列表）标识这些) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10472">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10473">密码或 pwd 后跟 0-2 个空格、一个等号 (=) 、0-2 个空格和一个星号 (\*) -OR-</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10473">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) -OR-</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10474">密码或 pwd 后跟：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10474">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10475">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10475">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10476">小于符号 (<) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10476">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10477">大写或小写字母、数字、星号 (\*) 、连字符 (-) 、下划线 (_) 或空格字符的 1-200 个字符的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10477">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10478">大于符号 (>) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10478">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10479">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10479">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10480"> (请注意，从技术上说，此敏感信息类型使用正则表达式（而不是关键字列表）标识这些) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10480">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10481">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10481">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10482">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10482">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10483">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10483">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10484">沙盒</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10484">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10485">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10485">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10486">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10486">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10487">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10487">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10488">testacs。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10488">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10489">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10489">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10490">s-int。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10490">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10491">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10491">net</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10492">瑞典驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10492">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10493">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10493">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10494">包含连字符的十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10494">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10495">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10495">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10496">包含连字符的十个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10496">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10497">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10497">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10498">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10498">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10499">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10499">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10500">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10500">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10501">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10501">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10502">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10502">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10503">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10503">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10504">正则表达式查找  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10504">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10505">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10505">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10638">瑞典国家/身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10638">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10639">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10639">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10640">10 个或 12 个数字和一个可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10640">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10641">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10641">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10642">10 或 12 位数字和可选的分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10642">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10643">两个数字 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10643">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10644">采用日期格式 YYMMDD 的六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10644">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10645">可选参数"-"或"+" () </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10645">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10646">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10646">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10647">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10647">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10648">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10648">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10649">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10649">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10650">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10650">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10651">函数 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10651">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10652">找到的 `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` 关键字来自</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10652">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10653">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10653">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10654">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10654">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10655">函数 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10655">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10656">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10656">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10675">瑞典护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10675">Sweden passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10676">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10676">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10677">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10677">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10678">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10678">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10679">八个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10679">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10680">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10680">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10681">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10681">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10682">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10682">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10683">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10683">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10684">正则表达式Regex_sweden_passport_number找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10684">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10685">找到或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_sweden_passport` 找到的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10685">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10686">正则表达式查找 `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY (01 JAN/JAN 12) 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10686">the regular expression `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` finds a date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (01 JAN/JAN 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10687">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10687">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10688">正则表达式Regex_sweden_passport_number找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10688">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10689">找到或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_sweden_passport` 找到的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10689">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10725">瑞典税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10725">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10726">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10726">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10727">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10727">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10728">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10728">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10729">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10729">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10730">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10730">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10731">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10731">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10732">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10732">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10733">10 个数字和指定模式中的符号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10733">10 digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10734">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10734">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10735">10 个数字和一个符号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10735">10 digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10736">六个数字，对应于 YYMMDD (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10736">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10737">加号或减号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10737">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10738">使标识号唯一的三个数字，其中：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10738">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10739">对于 1990 以前颁发的数字，第七位和第八位标识出生日期或出生日期的县</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10739">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10740">第九个位置的数字表示性别（男性为奇数或偶数）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10740">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10741">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10741">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10742">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10742">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10743">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10743">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10744">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10744">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10745">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10745">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10746">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10746">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10747">找到 的  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10747">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10748">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10748">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10749">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10749">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10775">SWIFT 代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10775">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10776">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10776">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10777">四个字母后跟 5-31 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10777">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10778">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10778">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10779">四个字母后跟 5-31 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10779">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10780">四个字母银行 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10780">four-letter bank code (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10781">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10781">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10782">4-28 个字母或数字（基本银行账号 (BBAN)）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10782">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10783">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10783">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10784">BBAN (一到三个字母或) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10784">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10785">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10785">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10786">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10786">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10787">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10787">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10788">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10788">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10789">正则表达式 Regex_swift 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10789">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10790">找到 Keyword_swift 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10790">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10827">瑞士 SSN AHV 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10827">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10828">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10828">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10829">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10829">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10830">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10830">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10831">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10831">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10832">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10832">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10833">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10833">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10834">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10834">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10835">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10835">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10836">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10836">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10837">13 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10837">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10838">三个数字 - 756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10838">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10839">可选点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10839">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10840">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10840">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10841">可选点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10841">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10842">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10842">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10843">可选点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10843">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10844">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10844">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10845">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10845">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10846">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10846">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10847">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10847">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10848">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10848">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10849">函数Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10849">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10850">找到来自Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10850">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10851">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10851">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10852">函数Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10852">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10873">台湾国家/地区身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10873">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10874">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10874">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10875">一个字母 (英文) 后跟九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10875">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10876">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10876">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10877">一个字母 (英文) 后跟九个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10877">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10878">一个字母 (英语，不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10878">one letter (in English, not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10879">数字"1"或"2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10879">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10880">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10880">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10881">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10881">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10882">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10882">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10883">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10883">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10884">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10884">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10885">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10885">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10886">找到 Keyword_taiwanese_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10886">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10887">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10887">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10888">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10888">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10889">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10889">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10890">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10890">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10892">Keyword_taiwan_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10892">Keyword_taiwan_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10896">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10896">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10897">身分證字號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10897">身分證字號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10898">身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10898">身分證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10899">身分證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10899">身分證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10900">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10900">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10901">身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10901">身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10902">國民身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10902">國民身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10903">簽名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10903">簽名</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10904">蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10904">蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10905">簽名或蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10905">簽名或蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10906">簽章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10906">簽章</span></span>   
   
## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10907">台湾护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10907">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10908">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10908">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10909">生物识别护照号码：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10909">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10910">非生物识别护照号码：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10910">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10911">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10911">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10912">生物识别护照号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10912">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10913">字符"3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10913">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10914">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10914">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10915">非生物识别护照号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10915">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10916">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10916">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10917">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10917">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10918">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10918">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10919">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10919">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10920">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10920">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10921">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10921">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10922">找到 Keyword_taiwan_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10922">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10923">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10923">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10924">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10924">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10925">ROC passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10925">ROC passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10926">Passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10926">Passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10927">Passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10927">Passport no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10928">Passport Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10928">Passport Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10929">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10929">Passport #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10930">护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10930">护照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10931">中華民國護照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10931">中華民國護照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10932">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10932">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span></span>
   
## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10933">中国台湾居民证书 (ARC/TARC) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10933">Taiwan-resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10934">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10934">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10935">10 letters and digits</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10935">10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10936">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10936">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10937">10 个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10937">10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10938">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10938">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10939">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10939">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10940">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10940">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10941">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10941">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10942">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10942">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10943">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10943">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10944">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10944">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10945">找到 Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10945">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10946">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10946">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10947">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10947">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10948">Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10948">Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10949">Resident Cert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10949">Resident Cert</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10950">Resident Cert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10950">Resident Cert.</span></span>

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10959">泰语总体标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10959">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10960">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10960">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10961">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10961">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10962">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10962">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10963">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10963">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10964">第一个数字不为零或九</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10964">first digit isn't zero or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10965">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10965">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10966">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10966">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10967">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10967">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10968">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10968">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10969">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10969">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10970">函数Func_Thai_Citizen_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10970">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10971">找到来自Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10971">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10972">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10972">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10973">函数Func_Thai_Citizen_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10973">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10976">ID 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10976">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10977">标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10977">Identification Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10978">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10978">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10979">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10979">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10980">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10980">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10981">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10981">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10982">土耳其国家标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10982">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10983">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10983">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10984">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10984">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10985">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10985">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10986">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10986">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10987">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10987">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10988">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10988">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10989">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10989">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10990">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10990">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10991">函数Func_Turkish_National_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10991">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10992">找到来自Keyword_Turkish_National_Id关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10992">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10993">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10993">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10994">函数Func_Turkish_National_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10994">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10995">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10995">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10996">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10996">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10997">TC Kim且否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10997">TC Kimlik No</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-10999">Vatandailal？k nu一s？</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-10999">Vatandaşlık numarası</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11001">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11001">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11002">driver's license number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11002">driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11003">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11003">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11004">特定格式的 18 个字母和数字组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11004">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11005">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11005">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11006">18 个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11006">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11007">五个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字"9"来表示字母。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11007">Five letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11008">一个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11008">One digit.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11009">日期格式 MMDDY 表示出生日期的五个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11009">Five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11010">如果驱动程序是男性，则第七个字符将递增 50;对于考试，51 到 62，而不是 01 到 12。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11010">The seventh character is incremented by 50 if driver is female; for exampe, 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11011">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字"9"来表示字母。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11011">Two letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11012">五个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11012">Five digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11013">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11013">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11014">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11014">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11015">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11015">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11016">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11016">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11017">函数 `Func_uk_drivers_license` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11017">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11018">找到 的 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11018">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11019">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11019">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11020">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11020">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11021">函数 `Func_uk_drivers_license` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11021">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11022">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11022">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11143">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11143">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11144">roll roll number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11144">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11145">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11145">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11146">两个字母后跟 1-4 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11146">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11147">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11147">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11148">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟 1-4 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11148">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11149">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11149">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11150">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11150">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11151">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11151">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11152">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11152">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11153">正则表达式 Regex_uk_electoral 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11153">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11154">找到 Keyword_uk_electoral 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11154">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11155">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11155">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11156">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11156">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11157">council nomination</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11157">council nomination</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11158">nomination form</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11158">nomination form</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11159">electoral register</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11159">electoral register</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11160">electoral roll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11160">electoral roll</span></span>

   
## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11161">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11161">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11162">national health service number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11162">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11163">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11163">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11164">10-17 个数字，通过空格分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11164">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11165">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11165">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11166">10-17 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11166">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11167">3 个或 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11167">either 3 or 10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11168">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11168">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11169">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11169">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11170">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11170">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11171">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11171">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11172">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11172">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11173">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11173">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11174">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11174">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11175">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11175">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11176">函数 Func_uk_nhs_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11176">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11177">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11177">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11178">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11178">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11179">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11179">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11180">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11180">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11181">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11181">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11199">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11199">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11200">NINO 保险号码 (NINO) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11200">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11201">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家标识号敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11201">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11202">它作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11202">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11203">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11203">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11204">七个字符或九个字符，用空格或短划线分隔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11204">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11205">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11205">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11206">两种可能的模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11206">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11207">两个字母 (有效 NINOs 仅使用此前缀中的某些字符，此模式对此进行验证;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11207">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11208">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11208">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11209">"A"、B、C 或"D" (类似前缀，后缀中只允许某些字符;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11209">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11210">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11210">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11211">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11211">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11212">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11212">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11213">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11213">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11214">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11214">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11215">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11215">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11216">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11216">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11217">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11217">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11218">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11218">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11219">"A"、"B"、"C"或"D"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11219">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11220">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11220">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11221">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11221">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11222">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11222">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11223">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11223">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11224">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11224">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11225">找到 Keyword_uk_nino 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11225">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11226">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11226">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11227">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11227">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. NINO -->
    <Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11249">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11249">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11250">唯一的纳税参考编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11250">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11251">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11251">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11252">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11252">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11253">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11253">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11254">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11254">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11255">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11255">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11256">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11256">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11257">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11257">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11258">不带空格和分隔符的 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11258">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11259">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11259">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11260">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11260">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11261">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11261">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11262">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11262">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11263">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11263">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11264">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11264">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11265">函数  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11265">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11266">找到 的  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11266">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11286">美国银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11286">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11287">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11287">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11288">6-17 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11288">6-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11289">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11289">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11290">6-17 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11290">6-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11291">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11291">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11292">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11292">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11293">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11293">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11294">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11294">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11295">正则表达式 Regex_usa_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11295">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11296">找到 Keyword_usa_Bank_Account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11296">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
```
