## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11326">美国驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11326">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11327">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11327">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11328">取决于州</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11328">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11329">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11329">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11330">取决于州 -例如，纽约：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11330">depends on the state - for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11331">9 个数字，格式为 ddd ddd ddd 将匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11331">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11332">9 个数字（如 ddddddddd）不匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11332">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11333">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11333">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11334">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11334">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11335">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11335">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11336">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11336">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11337">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11337">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11338">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11338">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11339">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11339">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11340">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11340">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11341">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11341">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11342">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11342">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11343">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11343">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11344">未找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11344">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11442">ITIN 中美国个人纳税 (标识号) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11442">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11443">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11443">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11444">九个数字，以"9"开头，包含"7"或"8"作为第四个数字，可选格式为空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11444">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11445">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11445">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11446">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11446">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11447">数字"9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11447">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11448">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11448">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11449">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11449">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11450">"7"或"8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11450">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11451">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11451">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11452">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11452">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11453">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11453">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11454">unformatted：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11454">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11455">数字"9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11455">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11456">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11456">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11457">"7"或"8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11457">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11458">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11458">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11459">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11459">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11460">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11460">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11461">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11461">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11462">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11462">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11463">函数 Func_formatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11463">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11464">找到 Keyword_itin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11464">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11465">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11465">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11466">函数 Func_unformatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11466">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11467">找到 Keyword_itin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11467">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11468">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11468">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11469">函数Func_formatted_itin或Func_unformatted_itin找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11469">The function Func_formatted_itin or Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
    <Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11470">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11470">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11471">Keyword_itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11471">Keyword_itin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11472">将</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11472">taxpayer</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11473">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11473">tax id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11474">tax identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11474">tax identification</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11475">itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11475">itin</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11476">i.t.i.n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11476">i.t.i.n.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11477">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11477">ssn</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11478">tin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11478">tin</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11479">social security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11479">social security</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11480">tax payer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11480">tax payer</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11481">itins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11481">itins</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11482">已</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11482">taxid</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11483">individual taxpayer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11483">individual taxpayer</span></span> 


## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11484">SSN (美国社会保险) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11484">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11485">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11485">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11486">九个数字，可能采用格式化或无格式模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11486">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11487">如果在 2011 年中旬前发布，则 SSN 具有强格式，即数字的某部分必须介于某个有效的范围中（但是没有校验和）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11487">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11488">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11488">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11489">四个函数以四种不同的模式查找 SSN：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11489">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11490">Func_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前使用短划线或空格格式化的强格式的 SSN（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11490">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11491">Func_unformatted_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前未格式化为 9 个连续数字的强格式的 SSN (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11491">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11492">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后使用短划线或空格（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）格式化的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11492">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11493">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后未格式化为 9 个连续数字 (ddddddddd) 的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11493">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11494">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11494">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11495">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11495">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11496">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11496">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11497">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11497">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11498">函数 Func_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11498">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11499">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11499">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11500">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11500">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11501">函数 Func_unformatted_ssn 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11501">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11502">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11502">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11503">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11503">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11504">函数 Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11504">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11505">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11505">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11506">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11506">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11507">函数 Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11507">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11508">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11508">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11509">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11509">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11510">Keyword_ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11510">Keyword_ssn</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11511">SSA 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11511">SSA Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11512">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11512">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11513">social security#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11513">social security #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11514">social security#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11514">social security#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11515">social security no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11515">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11516">Social Security#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11516">Social Security#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11517">Soc Sec</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11517">Soc Sec</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11518">SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11518">SSN</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11519">SSNS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11519">SSNS</span></span>

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11523">美国/英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11523">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11524">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11524">passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11525">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11525">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11526">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11526">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11527">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11527">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11528">九个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11528">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11529">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11529">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11530">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11530">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11531">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11531">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11532">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11532">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11533">函数 Func_usa_uk_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11533">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11534">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11534">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11535">找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字来自</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11535">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11536">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11536">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11537">函数 Func_usa_uk_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11537">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11538">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11538">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. / U.K. Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11554">乌克兰护照国内</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11554">Ukraine passport domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11555">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11555">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11556">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11556">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11557">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11557">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11558">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11558">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11559">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11559">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11560">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11560">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11561">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11561">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11562">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11562">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11563">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11563">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11564">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11564">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11565">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11565">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11566">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11566">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11567">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11567">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11568">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11568">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11569">正则表达式Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11569">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11570">找到来自Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11570">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11579">乌克兰护照国际</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11579">Ukraine passport international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11580">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11580">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11581">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11581">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11582">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11582">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11583">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11583">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11584">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11584">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11585">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11585">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11586">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11586">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11587">八字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11587">eight-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11588">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11588">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11589">八字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11589">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11590">两个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11590">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11591">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11591">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11592">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11592">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11593">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11593">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11594">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11594">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11595">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11595">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11596">正则表达式Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11596">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11597">找到来自Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11597">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11598">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11598">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ukraine_passport_international"></a><span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11599">Keyword_ukraine_passport_international</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11599">Keyword_ukraine_passport_international</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11600">乌克兰护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11600">ukraine passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11601">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11601">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11602">passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11602">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11603">паспорт України</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11603">паспорт України</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7c79f-11604">номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7c79f-11604">номер паспорта</span></span>
